GS39kamasutu:49: 1.1.5/.prajāpatir hi prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā tāṣāṃ sthiti^nibandhanaṃ trivargasya sādhanam adhyāyānāṃ śatasahasreṇa^agre provāca//(p.3)
GS39kamasutu:52: 1.1.8/.mahādeva^anucaraś ca nandī sahasreṇa^adhyāyānāṃ pṛthak kāmasūtraṃ provāca//(p.4)
GS39kamasutu:53: 1.1.9/.tad eva tu pañcabhir adhyāyaśatair auddālakiḥ śvetaketuḥ saṃcikṣepa//(p.4)
GS39kamasutu:54_1: ka^aupaniṣadikaḥ saptabhir adhikaraṇair bābhravyaḥ pāñcālaḥ saṃcikṣepa //(p.5)
GS39kamasutu:55: 1.1.11/.tasya ṣaṣṭhaṃ vaiśikam adhikaraṇaṃ pāṭaliputrikāṇāṃ gaṇikānāṃ niyogād dattakaḥ pṛthak cakāra//(p.5)
GS39kamasutu:62: 1.1.13/.evaṃ bahubhir ācāryais tacchāstraṃ khaṇḍaśaḥ praṇītam utsannakalpam abhūt/
GS39kamasutu:65: saṃkṣipya sarvam artham alpena granthena kāmasūtram idaṃ praṇītam//(p.6)
GS39kamasutu:166: 1.2.1/.śata^āyur vai puruṣo vibhajya kālam anyonya^anubaddhaṃ parasparasya^anupaghātakaṃ trivargaṃ seveta//(p.10)
GS39kamasutu:174: laukitvād] dṛṣṭa^arthatvāc ca pravṛttebhyaś ca māṃsa^bhakṣaṇa^ādibhyaḥ śāstrād eva nivāraṇaṃ dharmaḥ//(p.12)
GS39kamasutu:178: 1.2.11/.srotra^tvak^cakṣur^jihvā^ghrāṇānām ātma^saṃyuktena manasā^adhiṣṭhitānāṃ sveṣu sveṣu viṣayeṣv ānukūlyataḥ pravṛttiḥ kāmaḥ//(p.13)
GS39kamasutu:179: 1.2.12/.sparśa^viśeṣa^viṣayāt tv asya^abhimānika^sukha^anuviddhā phalavaty artha^pratītiḥ prādhānyāt kāmaḥ//(p.14)
GS39kamasutu:188: 1.2.17/.tiryag^yoniṣv api tu svayaṃ pravṛttatvāt kāmasya nityatvāc ca na śāstreṇa kṛtyam asti^ity ācāryāḥ//(p.16)
GS39kamasutu:192: ṛtau yāvad arthaṃ pravṛtter abuddhi^pūrvakatvāc ca pravṛttīnām anupāyaḥ pratyayaḥ//(p.17)
GS39kamasutu:201_2: darśanād varṇa^āśrama^ācāra^sthiti^lakṣaṇatvāc ca lokayātrāyā hastagatasya ca bījasya
GS39kamasutu:201_3: bhaviṣyataḥ sasya^arthe tyāga^darśanāc cared dharmān iti vātsyāyanaḥ //(p.19)
GS39kamasutu:203: prayatnato +api hy ete +anuṣṭhīyamānā na^eva kadācit syuḥ//
GS39kamasutu:206: 1.2.28/.kāla eva hi puruṣān artha^anarthayor jaya^parājayayoḥ sukha^duḥkhayoś ca sthāpayati//(p.21)
GS39kamasutu:210: kāla eva punar apy enaṃ kartā^iti kāla^kāraṇikāḥ//(p.22)
GS39kamasutu:215: dharma^arthayoḥ pradhānayor evam anyeṣāṃ ca satāṃ pratyanīkatvāt/
GS39kamasutu:216: anartha^jana^saṃsargam asad^vyavasāyam aśaucam anāyatiṃ ca^ete puruṣasya janayanti//(p.23)
GS39kamasutu:218: 1.2.34/.bahavaś ca kāmavaśagāḥ sagaṇā eva vinaṣṭāḥ śrūyante//(p.24)
GS39kamasutu:219: 1.2.35/.yathā dāṇḍakyo nāma bhojaḥ kāmād brāhmaṇa^kanyām abhimanyamānaḥ sabandhu^rāṣṭro vinanāśa//(p.24)
GS39kamasutu:220: 1.2.36/.devarājaś ca^ahalyām atibalaś ca kīcako draupadīṃ rāvaṇaś ca sītām apare ca^anye ca bahavo dṛśyante kāmavaśagā vinaṣṭā ity artha^cintakāḥ//(p.24)
GS39kamasutu:224: na hi bhikṣukāḥ santi^iti sthālyo na^adhiśrīyante/
GS39kamasutu:225: na hi mṛgāḥ santi^iti yavā na^upayanta iti vātsyāyanaḥ//
GS39kamasutu:227: 1.2.39ab/.evam arthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca^upācaran naraḥ/(p.25)
GS39kamasutu:229: 1.2.40ab/.kiṃ syāt paratra^ity āśaṅkā kārye yasmin na jāyate/(p.26)
GS39kamasutu:230: 1.2.40cd/.na ca^arthaghnaṃ sukhaṃ ca^iti śiṣṭās tatra vyavasthitāḥ//(p.26)
GS39kamasutu:231: 1.2.41ab/.trivarga^sādhakaṃ yat syād dvayor ekasya vā punaḥ/(p.26)
GS39kamasutu:232: 1.2.41cd/.kāryaṃ tad api kurvīta na tv eka^arthaṃ dvi^bādhakam//(p.26)
GS39kamasutu:237: 1.3.3/.yoṣitāṃ śāstra^grahaṇasya^abhāvād anarthakam iha śāstre strī^śāsanam ity ācāryāḥ//(p.27)
GS39kamasutu:241: sarvatra hi loke kati cid eva śāstrajñāḥ/
GS39kamasutu:243: 1.3.6/.prayogasya ca dūrastham api śāstram eva hetuḥ//(p.28)
GS39kamasutu:244: 1.3.7/.asti vyākaraṇam ity avaiyākaraṇā api yājñikā ūhaṃ kratuṣu prayuñjate//(p.29)
GS39kamasutu:246: 1.3.9/.tathā^aśva^ārohā gaja^ārohāś ca^aśvān gajāṃś ca^anadhigata^śāstrā api vinayante//(p.29)
GS39kamasutu:247: 1.3.10/.tathā^asti rājā^iti dūrasthā api janapadā na maryādām ativartante tadvad etat//(p.29)
GS39kamasutu:248: 1.3.11/.santy api khalu śāstra^prahata^buddhayo gaṇikā rājaputryo mahāmātra^duhitaraś ca//(p.30)
GS39kamasutu:249: 1.3.12/.tasmād vaiśvāsikāj janād rahasi prayogāñ chāstram ekadeśaṃ vā strī gṛhṇīyāt//(p.30)
GS39kamasutu:250: 1.3.13/.abhyāsa^prayojyāṃś ca cātuḥṣaṣṭikān yogān kanyā rahasy ekākiny abhyaset//(p.30)
GS39kamasutu:329: 1.3.18a/.pūjitā sā sadā rājñā guṇavadbhiś ca saṃstutā/(p.42)
GS39kamasutu:339: 1.3.22b/.deśa^kālau tv apekṣya^āsāṃ prayogaḥ saṃbhaven na vā//(p.42)
GS39kamasutu:341: 1.4.1/.gṛhītavidyaḥ pratigraha^jaya^kraya^nirveśa^adhigatair arthair anvaya^āgatair ubhayair vā gārhasthyam adhigamya nāgaraka^vṛttaṃ varteta//(p.43)
GS39kamasutu:342: 1.4.2/.nagare pattane kharvaṭe mahati vā sajjana^āśraye sthānam/
GS39kamasutu:344: 1.4.3/.tatra bhavanam āsanna^udakaṃ vṛkṣa^vāṭikāvad vibhakta^karma^kakṣaṃ dvi^vāsa^gṛhaṃ kārayet//(p.44)
GS39kamasutu:345: 1.4.4/.bāhye ca vāsa^gṛhe suślakṣṇam ubhaya^upadhānaṃ madhye vinataṃ śukla^uttara^cchadaṃ śayanīyaṃ syāt/
GS39kamasutu:348: tatra rātri^śeṣam anulepanaṃ mālyaṃ siktha^karaṇḍakaṃ saugandhika^puṭikā mātuluṅga^tvacas tāmbūlāni ca syuḥ/
GS39kamasutu:358: ekānte ca takṣa^takṣaṇa^sthānam anyāsāṃ ca krīḍānām/
GS39kamasutu:363: mātrayā^anulepanaṃ dhūpaṃ srajam iti ca gṛhītvā,
GS39kamasutu:372: pañcamakaṃ daśamakaṃ vā pratyāyuṣyam ity ahīnam/
GS39kamasutu:384: tad ante ca prasādhite vāsa^gṛhe saṃcārita^surabhi^dhūpe sasahāyasya śayyāyām abhisārikāṇāṃ pratīkṣaṇam,
GS39kamasutu:387: 1.4.12/.āgatānāṃ ca manoharair ālāpair upacāraiś ca sasahāyasya^upakramāḥ/
GS39kamasutu:388: 1.4.13/.varṣa^pramṛṣṭane pathyānāṃ durdinā^abhisārikāṇāṃ svayam eva punar maṇḍanam,
GS39kamasutu:399: tato yathāśraddham eṣāṃ darśanam utsargo vā/
GS39kamasutu:403: 1.4.18/.etena taṃ taṃ devatā^viśeṣam uddiśya saṃbhāvita^sthitayo ghaṭā vyākhyātāḥ//(p.51)
GS39kamasutu:405: udvasite] vā samāna^vidyā^buddhi^śīla^vitta^vayasāṃ saha veśyābhir anurūpair ālāpair āsana^bandho goṣṭhī/
GS39kamasutu:414: 1.4.25/.pūrvāhṇa eva svalaṃkṛtās turaga^adhirūḍhā veśyābhiḥ saha paricāraka^anugatā gaccheyuḥ/
GS39kamasutu:415: daivasikīṃ ca yātrāṃ tatra^anubhūya kukkuṭa^yuddha^dyūtaiḥ prekṣābhir anukūlaiś ca ceṣṭitaiḥ kālaṃ gamayitvā aparāhṇe gṛhīta^tad^udyāna^upabhoga^cihnās tathā^eva pratyāvrajeyuḥ/
GS39kamasutu:428: tās tāś ca māhimānyo deśyāś ca krīḍā janebhyo viśiṣṭam ācareyuḥ/
GS39kamasutu:431: 1.4.30/.gaṇikāyā nāyikāyāś ca sakhībhir nāgarakaiś ca saha caritam etena vyākhyātam//(p.57)
GS39kamasutu:433: deśād āgataḥ kalāsu vicakṣaṇas tad^upadeśena goṣṭhyāṃ veśa^ucite ca vṛtte sādhayed ātmānam iti pīṭha^mardaḥ//(p.58)
GS39kamasutu:434: 1.4.32/.bhukta^vibhavas tu guṇavān sakalatro veśe goṣṭhyāṃ ca bahumatas tad upajīvī ca viṭaḥ//(p.58)
GS39kamasutu:438: 1.4.35/.tair bhikṣukyaḥ kalā^vidagdhā muṇḍā vṛṣalyo vṛddha^gaṇikāś ca vyākhyātāḥ//(p.59)
GS39kamasutu:439: 1.4.36/.grāma^vāsī ca sajātān vicakṣaṇān kautūhalikān protsāhya nāgarakajanasya vṛttaṃ varṇayañ śraddhāṃ ca janayaṃs tad eva^anukurvīta/
GS39kamasutu:448: 1.4.38b/.parahiṃsā^ātmikā yā ca na tām avatared budhaḥ//(p.60)
GS39kamasutu:452: 1.5.1/.kāmaś caturṣu varṇeṣu savarṇataḥ śāstrataś ca^ananya^pūrvāyāṃ prayujyamānaḥ putrīyo yaśasyo laukikaś ca bhavati//(p.61)
GS39kamasutu:455: veśyāsu punarbhūṣu ca na śiṣṭo na pratiṣiddhaḥ/
GS39kamasutu:457: 1.5.3/.tatra nāyikās tisraḥ kanyā punarbhūr veśyā ca/ iti//(p.62)
GS39kamasutu:460: 1.5.6/.anyato +api bahuśo vyavasita^cāritrā tasyāṃ veśyāyām iva gamanam uttama^varṇinyām api na dharma^pīḍāṃ kariṣyati/
GS39kamasutu:463: 1.5.8/.patiṃ vā mahāntam īśvaram asmad^amitra^saṃsṛṣṭam iyam avagṛhya prabhutvena carati/
GS39kamasutu:464: sā mayā saṃsṛṣṭā snehād enaṃ vyāvartayiṣyati//(p.64)
GS39kamasutu:465: 1.5.9/.virasaṃ vā mayi śaktam apakartukāmaṃ ca prakṛtim āpādayiṣyati//(p.64)
GS39kamasutu:466: 1.5.10/.tayā vā mitrī^kṛtena mitra^kāryam amitra^pratīghātam anyad vā duṣpratipādakaṃ kāryaṃ sādhayiṣyāmi//(p.65)
GS39kamasutu:467: 1.5.11/.saṃsṛṣṭo vā^anayā hatvā^asyāḥ patim asmadbhāvyaṃ tad aiśvaryam evam adhigamiṣyāmi//(p.65)
GS39kamasutu:470: so +aham anena^upāyena taddhanam atimahad akṛcchrād adhigamiṣyāmi/
GS39kamasutu:471: 1.5.13/.marmajñā vā mayi dṛdham abhikāmā sā mām anicchantaṃ doṣa^vikhyāpānena dūṣayiṣyati//(p.65)
GS39kamasutu:472: 1.5.14/.asad^bhūtaṃ vā doṣaṃ śraddheyaṃ duṣparihāraṃ mayi kṣepsyati yena me vināśaḥ syāt//(p.66)
GS39kamasutu:473: 1.5.15/.āyatimantaṃ vā vaśyaṃ patiṃ matto vibhidya dviṣataḥ saṃgrāhayiṣyati//(p.66)
GS39kamasutu:475: madavarodhānāṃ vā dūṣayitā patir asyās tad asyāham api dārān eva dūṣayan pratikariṣyāmi//(p.66)
GS39kamasutu:480: 1.5.20/.mama^amitro vāsyāḥ patyā sahaikībhāvam upagatas tam anayā rasena yojayiṣyāmi^ity evam ādibhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ parastriyam api prakurvīta//(p.67)
GS39kamasutu:483: 1.5.22/.etair eva kāraṇair mahāmātra^saṃbaddhā rāja^saṃbaddhā vā tatra^eka^deśa^cāriṇī kā cid anyā vā kārya^saṃpādinī vidhavā pañcamī^iti cārāyaṇaḥ/
GS39kamasutu:488: tasmāc catasra eva nāyikā iti vātsyāyanaḥ/
GS39kamasutu:494: tāṃs tu^ubhayor api guṇa^aguṇān vaiśike vakṣyāmaḥ//(p.69)
GS39kamasutu:495_0: 1.5.29 /.agamyās tv eva^etāḥ ---kuṣṭhiny unmattā patitā bhinnarahasyā prakāśaprārthinī
GS39kamasutu:495_1: gataprāyayauvanā^atiśvetā^atikṛṣṇā durgandhā saṃbandhinī sakhī pravrajitā saṃbandhi^sakhi^śrotriya^rājadārāś ca //(p.69)
GS39kamasutu:498: 1.5.32/.saha pāṃsu^krīḍitam upakāra^saṃbaddhaṃ samāna^śīla^vyasanaṃ saha^adhyāyinaṃ yaś ca^asya marmāṇi rahasyāni ca vidyāt,
GS39kamasutu:499: yasya ca^ayaṃ vidyād vā dhātrapatyaṃ sahasaṃvṛddhaṃ mitram//(p.71)
GS39kamasutu:500: 1.5.33/.pitṛ^paitāmaham avisaṃvādakam adṛṣṭa^vaikṛtaṃ vaśyaṃ dhruvam alobha^śīlam aparihāryam amantra^visrāvi^iti mitrasaṃpat//(p.71)
GS39kamasutu:502: tad^yoṣin^mitrāś ca nāgarakāḥ syur iti vātsyāyanaḥ//(p.72)
GS39kamasutu:503: 1.5.35/.yad ubhayoḥ sādhāraṇam ubhayatrodāraṃ viśeṣato nāyikāyāḥ suvisrabdhaṃ tatra dūtakarma//(p.72)
GS39kamasutu:504: 1.5.36/.paṭutā dhārṣṭyam iṅgitākārajñatā pratāraṇa^kālajñatā viṣahya^buddhitvaṃ laghvī pratipattiḥ sa^upāyā ca^iti dūtaguṇāḥ//
GS39kamasutu:514: viṣameṣv api puruṣa^ādhikyaṃ ced anantara^saṃprayoge dve ucca^rate/
GS39kamasutu:523: 2.1.5/.yasya saṃprayoga^kāle prītir udāsīnā vīryam alpaṃ kṣatāni ca na sahate sa manda^vegaḥ//(p.76)
GS39kamasutu:530: 2.1.12/.sā punar ābhimānikena sukhena saṃsṛṣṭā rasa^antaraṃ janayati/
GS39kamasutu:533: prīteś] ca^anabhijñatvāt kathaṃ te sukham iti praṣṭum aśakyatvāt/
GS39kamasutu:534: 2.1.14/.katham etad upalabhyata iti cet puruṣo hi ratim adhigamya svecchayā viramati,
GS39kamasutu:538: cira^vege nāyake striyo +anurajyante śīghra^vegasya bhāvam anāsādya^avasāne +abhyasūyinyo *bhavati[ch:bhavanti]/
GS39kamasutu:539: tat sarvaṃ bhāva^prāpter aprāpteś ca lakṣaṇam//(p.79)
GS39kamasutu:540: 2.1.16/.tac ca na/ kaṇḍūti^pratīkāro +api hi dīrgha^kālaṃ priya iti/
GS39kamasutu:548: na hy asatyāṃ bhāva^prāptau garbha^saṃbhava iti bābhravīyāḥ//(p.80)
GS39kamasutu:550: 2.1.20/.tatra^etat syāt --- sātatyena rasa^prāptāv ārambha^kāle madhyastha^cittatā na^atisahiṣṇutā ca/
GS39kamasutu:552: ante ca virāma^abhīpsā^ity etad upapannam iti//(p.82)
GS39kamasutu:553: 2.1.21/.tac ca na/ sāmānye +api bhrānti^saṃskāre kulālacakrasya bhramarakasya vā bhrāntāv eva vartamānasya prārambhe manda^vegatā tataś ca krameṇa pūraṇam vegasyā^ity upapadyate/
GS39kamasutu:556: 2.1.22a/.suratā^ante sukhaṃ puṃsāṃ strīṇāṃ tu satataṃ sukham/(p.83)
GS39kamasutu:559: 2.1.24/.kathaṃ hi samānāyām eva^ākṛtāv eka^artham abhiprapannayoḥ kārya^vailakṣaṇyaṃ syād
GS39kamasutu:563: anyathā hi kartā kriyāṃ pratipadyate +anyathā ca^ādhāraḥ/
GS39kamasutu:564: tasmāc ca^upāya^vailakṣaṇyāt sargād abhimāna^vailakṣaṇyam api bhavati/
GS39kamasutu:567: 2.1.27/.tatra^etat syād upāya^vailakṣaṇyavad eva hi kārya^vailakṣaṇyam api kasmān na syād iti/
GS39kamasutu:570: tatra kartrādhārayor bhinna^lakṣaṇatvād ahetumat kārya^vailakṣaṇyam anyāyyaṃ syāt/
GS39kamasutu:574: pṛthak pṛthak svārtha^sādhakau punar imau tad ayuktam iti//(p.85)
GS39kamasutu:575: 2.1.29/.tac ca na/ yugapad aneka^artha^siddhir api dṛśyate/
GS39kamasutu:576: yathā meṣayor abhighāte kapitthayor bhede mallayor yuddha iti/
GS39kamasutu:577: na tatra kāraka^bheda iti ced iha^api na vastu^bheda iti/
GS39kamasutu:578: upāya^vailakṣaṇyaṃ tu sargād iti tad abhihitaṃ purastāt/
GS39kamasutu:583: kāla^yoginy api bhāvato +api kālataḥ pramāṇavad eva nava ratāni//(p.87)
GS39kamasutu:584: 2.1.32/.raso ratiḥ prītir bhāvo rāgo vegaḥ samāptir iti rati^paryāyāḥ/
GS39kamasutu:585: saṃprayogo rataṃ rahaḥ śayanaṃ mohanaṃ surata^paryāyāḥ//(p.88)
GS39kamasutu:586: 2.1.33/.pramāṇa^kāla^bhāvajānāṃ saṃprayogāṇām ekaikasya navavidhatvāt teṣāṃ vyatikare surata^saṃkhyā na śakyate kartum/
GS39kamasutu:595: 2.1.37b/.prāpnuvanty āśu tāḥ prītim ity ācāryā vyavasthitāḥ//(p.91)
GS39kamasutu:603: 2.1.41b/.saṃkalpāj jāyate prītir yā sā syād ābhimānikī//(p.92)
GS39kamasutu:611: 2.1.45b/.yo yathā vartate bhāvas taṃ tathā^eva prayojayet//(p.94)
GS39kamasutu:616: 2.2.3/.kalānāṃ catuḥṣaṣṭitvāt tāsāṃ ca saṃprayoga^aṅga^bhūtatvāt kalā^samūho vā catuḥṣaṣṭir iti/
GS39kamasutu:619: pañcāla^saṃbandhāc ca bahv^ṛcair eṣā pūjā^arthaṃ saṃjñā pravartitā ity eke//(p.95)
GS39kamasutu:620: 2.2.4/.āliṅgana^cumbana^nakha^cchedya^daśana^cchedya^saṃveśana^sītkṛta^puru ṣa^āyita^aupariṣṭakānām aṣṭānām aṣṭadhā vikalpa^bhedād aṣṭāv aṣṭakāś catuḥṣaṣṭir iti bābhravīyāḥ//(p.96)
GS39kamasutu:621: 2.2.5/.vikalpa^vargāṇām aṣṭānāṃ nyūna^adhikatva^darśanāt prahaṇana^viruta^puruṣopasṛpta^citrarata^ādīnām anyeṣām api vargāṇām iha praveśanāt prāyovādo +ayam/
GS39kamasutu:622: yathā sapta^parṇo vṛkṣaḥ pañca^varṇo balir iti vātsyāyanaḥ//(p.96)

GS39kamasutu:1003: 2.9.2/.tatra strī^rūpiṇī strīyā veṣa^mālāpaṃ līlāṃ bhāvaṃ mṛdutvaṃ bhīrutvaṃ mugdhatām asahiṣṇutāṃ vrīḍāṃ ca^anukurvīta//(p.166)
GS39kamasutu:1006: 2.9.4/.sā tato ratim ābhimānikīṃ vṛttiṃ ca lipset/
GS39kamasutu:1009: 2.9.6/.puruṣa^rūpiṇī tu pracchanna^kāmā puruṣaṃ lipsamānā saṃvāhaka^bhāvam upajīvet/
GS39kamasutu:1014: 2.9.10/.kṛta^lakṣaṇena^apy upalabdha^vaikṛtena^api na codyata iti cet svayam (p.166) upakramet/
GS39kamasutu:1018: 2.9.13/.nimitaṃ pārśvato daṣṭaṃ bahiḥsaṃdaṃśo +antaḥsaṃdaṃśaś cumbitakaṃ parimṛṣṭakam āmracūṣitakaṃ saṃgara iti//(p.167)
GS39kamasutu:1020: 2.9.15/.itaraś ca pūrvasminn abhyupagate taduttaram eva^aparaṃ nirdiśet/
GS39kamasutu:1022: 2.9.16/.kara^avalambitam oṣṭhayor upari vinyastam apavidhya mukhaṃ vidhunuyāt/
GS39kamasutu:1024: 2.9.17/.hasteṇa^agram avacchādya pārśvato nirdaśanam oṣṭābhyām avapīḍya bhavatv etāvad iti sāntvayet/
GS39kamasutu:1026: 2.9.18/.bhūyaś coditā saṃmīlita^oṣṭhī tasya^agraṃ niṣpīḍya karṣayantī^iva cumbet/
GS39kamasutu:1032: 2.9.21/.tat kṛtvā jihvā^agreṇa sarvato ghaṭṭanam agre ca vyadhanam iti parimṛṣṭakam//(p.169)
GS39kamasutu:1033: 2.9.22/.tathābhūtam eva rāgavaśād ardha^praviṣṭaṃ nirdayam avapīḍyāv apīḍya muñcet/
GS39kamasutu:1039: 2.9.25/.kulaṭāḥ svairiṇyaḥ paricārikāḥ saṃvāhikāś ca^apy etat prayojayanti//(p.170)
GS39kamasutu:1042: punar api hy āsāṃ vadana^saṃsarge svayam eva^ārtiṃ prapadyeta/
GS39kamasutu:1047: 2.9.28/.tasmād yās tv aupariṣṭakam ācaranti na tābhiḥ saha saṃsṛjyante prācyāḥ//(p.171)
GS39kamasutu:1048: 2.9.29/.veśyābhir eva na saṃsṛjyante āhicchatrikāḥ saṃsṛṣṭā api mukha^karma tāsāṃ pariharanti//(p.171)
GS39kamasutu:1052: 2.9.33/.evaṃ hy āhuḥ --- ko hi yoṣitāṃ śīlaṃ śaucam ācāraṃ caritraṃ pratyayaṃ vacanaṃ vā śraddhātum arhati/
GS39kamasutu:1053: nisargād eva hi malina^dṛṣṭayo bhavanty etā na parityājyāḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1054: tasmād āsāṃ smṛtita eva śaucam anveṣṭavyam/
GS39kamasutu:1056: vatsaḥ prasravaṇe medhyaḥ śvā mṛga^grahaṇe śuciḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1058: 2.9.34/.śiṣṭa^vipratipatteḥ smṛti^vākyasya ca sāvakāśatvād deśasthiter ātmanaś ca vṛtti^pratyaya^anurūpaṃ pravarteta/
GS39kamasutu:1065: 2.9.37ab/.puruṣāś ca tathā strīṣu karma^etat kila kurvate/(p.174)
GS39kamasutu:1071: 2.9.40ab/.na tv etad brāhmaṇo vidvān mantrī vā rāja^dhūr^dharaḥ//(p.175)
GS39kamasutu:1073: 2.9.41ab/.na śāstram asti^ity etāvat prayoge kāraṇaṃ bhavet/(p.175)
GS39kamasutu:1076: 2.9.42cd/.kīrtitā iti tat kiṃ syād bhakṣaṇīyaṃ vicakṣaṇaiḥ//(p.176)
GS39kamasutu:1077: 2.9.43ab/.santy eva puruṣāḥ ke cit santi deśās tathā^vidhāḥ/(p.176)
GS39kamasutu:1078: 2.9.43cd/.santi kālāś ca yeṣv ete yogā na syur nirarthakāḥ//(p.176)
GS39kamasutu:1079: 2.9.44ab/.tasmād deśaṃ ca kālaṃ ca prayogaṃ śāstram eva ca/(p.176)
GS39kamasutu:1080: 2.9.44cd/.ātmānaṃ ca^api saṃprekṣya yogān yuñjīta vā na vā//(p.176)
GS39kamasutu:1082: 2.9.45cd/.kaḥ kadā kiṃ kutaḥ kuryād iti ko jñātum arhati//(p.176)
GS39kamasutu:1084_0: 2.10.1 /.nāgarakaḥ saha mitrajanena paricārakaiś ca kṛta^puṣpa^upahāre saṃcārita^surabhi^dhūpe
GS39kamasutu:1084_1: raty^āvāse prasādhite vāsa^gṛhe kṛta^snāna^prasādhanāṃ yuktyā pītāṃ striyaṃ sāntvanaiḥ
GS39kamasutu:1095: vijane ca yathā^uktair āliṅgana^ādibhir enām uddharṣayet/
GS39kamasutu:1098: 2.10.6/.rata^avasānikaṃ rāgam ativāhya^asaṃstutayor iva savrīḍayoḥ parasparam apaśyatoḥ pṛthak pṛthag ācāra^bhūmi^gamanam/
GS39kamasutu:1099: pratinivṛttya ca^āvrīḍāyamānayor ucita^deśa^upaviṣṭayos tāmbūla^grahaṇam acchīkṛtaṃ candanam anyad vā^anulepanaṃ tasyā gātre svayam eva niveśayet/
GS39kamasutu:1100: 2.10.7/.savyena bāhunā ca^enāṃ parirabhya caṣaka^hastaḥ sāntvayan pāyayet/
GS39kamasutu:1101: jala^anupānaṃ vā khaṇḍa^khādyakam anyad vā prakṛti^sātmya^yuktam ubhāv apy upayuñjīyātām/
GS39kamasutu:1102: 2.10.8/.accha^rasaka^yūṣam amlayavāgūṃ bhṛṣṭa^māṃsa^upadaṃśāni pānakāni cūta^phalāni śuṣka^māṃsaṃ mātuluṅga^cukrakāṇi saśarkarāṇi ca yathā^deśa^sātmyaṃ ca/
GS39kamasutu:1103: tatra madhuram idaṃ mṛdu viśadam iti ca vidaśya vidaśya tat tad upāharet/
GS39kamasutu:1115: 2.10.13a/.ādye saṃdarśane jāte pūrvaṃ ye syur manorathāḥ/(p.181)
GS39kamasutu:1118: 2.10.13d/.tais taiś ca bhāvaiḥ saṃyukto yūno rāgo vivardhate//(p.181)
GS39kamasutu:1119: 2.10.14/.rāgavad āhāryarāgaṃ kṛtrimarāgaṃ vyavahitarāgaṃ poṭārataṃ khalaratam ayantritaratam iti rataviśeṣāḥ//(p.182)
GS39kamasutu:1120: 2.10.15/.saṃdarśanāt prabhṛty ubhayor api pravṛddha^rāgayoḥ prayatna^kṛte samāgame pravāsa^pratyāgamane vā kalaha^viyoga^yoge tad^rāgavat//(p.182)
GS39kamasutu:1123: 2.10.18/.tatra cātuḥṣaṣṭikair yogaiḥ sātmya^anuviddhaiḥ saṃdhukṣya saṃdhukṣya rāgaṃ pravarteta/
GS39kamasutu:1126: 2.10.21/.puruṣas tu hṛdaya^priyām anyāṃ manasi nidhāya vyavaharet/
GS39kamasutu:1129: 2.10.22/.nyūnāyāṃ kumbha^dāsyāṃ paricārikāyāṃ vā yāvad arthaṃ saṃprayogas tat^poṭāratam//(p.184)
GS39kamasutu:1131: 2.10.24/.tathā veśyāyā grāmīṇena saha yāvad arthaṃ khalaratam//(p.184)
GS39kamasutu:1135: 2.10.27/.vardhamāna^praṇayā tu nāyikā sapatnīnām agrahaṇaṃ tad^āśrayam ālāpaṃ vā gotra^skhalitaṃ vā na marṣayet/
GS39kamasutu:1137: 2.10.28/.tatra subhṛśaḥ kalaho ruditam āyāsaḥ śiro^ruhāṇām avakṣodanaṃ prahaṇanam āsanāc chayanād vā mahyāṃ patanaṃ mālya^bhūṣaṇa^avamokṣo bhūmau śayyā ca//(p.185)
GS39kamasutu:1138: 2.10.29/.tatra yukta^rūpeṇa sāmnā pāda^patanena vā prasanna^manās tām anunayann upakramya śayanam ārohayet//(p.185)
GS39kamasutu:1139: 2.10.30/.tasya ca vacanam uttareṇa yojayantī vivṛddha^krodhā sakaca^graham asya^āsyam unnamayya pādena bāhau śirosi vakṣasi pṛṣṭhe vā sakṛd dvis trir avahanyāt/
GS39kamasutu:1146: prasannā^api tu sakaṣāyair eva vākyair enaṃ tudatī^iva prasanna^rati^kāṅkṣiṇī nāyakena parirabhyeta//(p.186)
GS39kamasutu:1147: 2.10.32/.svabhavanasthā tu nimittāt kalahitā tathā^vidha^ceṣṭā^eva nāyakam abhigacchet/ (p.186)
GS39kamasutu:1148: 2.10.33/.tatra pīṭhamarda^viṭa^vidūṣakair nāyaka^prayuktair upaśamita^roṣā tair eva^anunītā taiḥ saha^eva tad^bhavanam adhigacchet/
GS39kamasutu:1166: 3.1.1/.savarṇāyām ananyapūrvāyāṃ śāstrato +adhigatāyāṃ dharmo +arthaḥ putrāḥ saṃbandhaḥ pakṣavṛddhir anupaskṛtā ratiś ca//(p.190)
GS39kamasutu:1167_0: 3.1.2 /.tasmāt kanyām abhijana^upetāṃ mātā^pitṛ^matīṃ tri^varṣāt prabhṛti nyūna^vayasaṃ
GS39kamasutu:1167_1: ślāghya^ācāre dhanavati pakṣavati kule saṃbandhi^priye saṃbandhibhir ākule prasūtāṃ
GS39kamasutu:1169: 3.1.3/.yāṃ gṛhītvā kṛtinam ātmānaṃ manyeta na ca samānair nindyeta tasyāṃ pravṛttir iti ghoṭakamukhaḥ//(p.191)
GS39kamasutu:1172: 3.1.5/.tāny anyeṣāṃ varayitṝṇāṃ doṣān pratyakṣa^anāgamikāṃś ca śrāvayeyuḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1174: viśeṣataś ca kanyāmātur anukūlāṃs tadātva^āyatiyuktān darśayeyuḥ//(p.192)
GS39kamasutu:1175: 3.1.6/.daiva^cintaka^rūpaś ca śakuna^nimitta^graha^lagna^bala^lakṣaṇa^darśanena nāyakasya bhaviṣyantam artha^saṃyogaṃ kalyāṇam anuvarṇayet//(p.192)
GS39kamasutu:1176: 3.1.7/.apare punar asya^anyato viśiṣṭena kanyālābhena kanyāmātaram unmādayeyuḥ//(p.193)
GS39kamasutu:1180: 3.1.11/.apraśasta^nāmadheyāṃ ca guptāṃ dattāṃ ghonāṃ pṛṣatām ṛṣabhāṃ vinatāṃ vikaṭāṃ vimuṇḍāṃ śuci^dūṣitāṃ sāṃkarikīṃ rākāṃ phalīnīṃ mitrāṃ svanujām varṣakarīṃ ca varjayet//(p.193)
GS39kamasutu:1186: aparāhṇikaṃ ca nityaṃ prasādhitāyāḥ sakhībhiḥ saha krīḍā/
GS39kamasutu:1190: 3.1.15/.varaṇa^artham upagatāṃś ca bhadra^darśanān pradakṣiṇa^vācaś ca tatsaṃbandhi^saṃgatān puruṣān maṅgalaiḥ pratigṛhṇīyuḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1194: 3.1.18/.snāna^ādiṣu niyujyamānā varayitāraḥ sarvaṃ bhaviṣyati^ity uktvā na tad^ahar^eva^abhyupagaccheyuḥ//(p.196)
GS39kamasutu:1195: 3.1.19/.deśa^pravṛtti^sātmyād vā brāhma^prājāpatya^ārṣa^daivānām anyatamena vivāhena śāstrataḥ pariṇayet/
GS39kamasutu:1207: 3.1.24cd/.na tv eva hīna^saṃbandhaṃ kuryāt sadbhir vininditam//(p.197)
GS39kamasutu:1209: 3.2.1/.saṃgatayos trirātram adhaḥ śayyā brahma^caryaṃ kṣāra^lavaṇa^varjam āhāras tathā saptāhaṃ satūrya^maṅgala^snānaṃ prasādhanaṃ saha^bhojanaṃ ca prekṣā saṃbandhināṃ ca pūjanam/
GS39kamasutu:1211: 3.2.2/.tasminn etāṃ niśi vijane mṛdubhir upacārair upakrameta//(p.198)
GS39kamasutu:1212: 3.2.3/.trirātram avacanaṃ hi stambham iva nāyakaṃ paśyantī kanyā nirvidyeta paribhavec ca tṛtīyām iva prakṛtim/
GS39kamasutu:1219: tās tv anadhigata^viśvāsaiḥ prasabham upakramyamāṇāḥ saṃprayoga^dveṣiṇyo bhavanti/
GS39kamasutu:1221: 3.2.7/.yuktyā^api tu yataḥ prasaram upalabhet tena^eva^anu praviśet//(p.200)
GS39kamasutu:1229: tad^apratipadyamānāṃ ca sāntvanair vākyaiḥ śapathaiḥ pratiyācitaiḥ pāda^patanaiś ca grāhayet/
GS39kamasutu:1230: vrīḍā^yuktā^api yoṣid^atyanta^kruddhā^api na pāda^patanam ativartate iti sārvatrikam//(p.200)
GS39kamasutu:1233: 3.2.14/.tac^chravaṇa^arthaṃ yat kiṃ cid alpa^akṣara^abhidheyam ajānann iva pṛcchet/
GS39kamasutu:1234: 3.2.15/.tatra niṣpratipattim anudvejayan sāntvanā yuktaṃ bahuśa eva pṛcchet/
GS39kamasutu:1236: 3.2.17/.sarvā eva hi kanyāḥ puruṣeṇa prayujyamānaṃ vacanaṃ viṣa^hante/
GS39kamasutu:1237: na tu laghu^miśrām api vācaṃ vadanti/
GS39kamasutu:1241: 3.2.19/.icchasi māṃ na^icchasi vā kiṃ te +ahaṃ rucito na rucito vā^iti pṛṣṭā ciraṃ sthitvā nirbadhyamānā tadā^anukūlyena śiraḥ kampayet/
GS39kamasutu:1243: 3.2.20/.saṃstutā cet sakhīm anukūlām ubhayato +api visrabdhāṃ tām antarā kṛtvā kathāṃ yojayet/
GS39kamasutu:1246: sā tu parihāsa^artham idam anayā^uktam iti ca^anuktam (p.202) api brūyāt/
GS39kamasutu:1247: tatra tām apanudya prativacana^artham abhyarthyamānā tūṣṇīm āsīta/
GS39kamasutu:1248: nirbadhyamānā tu na^aham evaṃ bravīmi^ity avyakta^akṣaram
GS39kamasutu:1250: nāyakaṃ ca vihasantī kadā cit kaṭākṣaiḥ prekṣeta/
GS39kamasutu:1252: 3.2.21/.evaṃ jāta^paricayā ca^anirvadantī tat^samīpe yācitaṃ tāmbūlaṃ vilepanaṃ srajaṃ nidadhyāt/
GS39kamasutu:1255: 3.2.23/.vāryamāṇaś ca tvam api māṃ pariṣvajasva tato na^evam ācariṣyāmi^iti sthityā pariṣvañjayet/
GS39kamasutu:1256: svaṃ ca hastam ā nābhi^deśāt prasārya nirvartayet/
GS39kamasutu:1257: krameṇa ca^enām utsaṅgam āropya^adhikam adhikam upakramet/
GS39kamasutu:1259: 3.2.24/.ahaṃ khalu tava danta^padāny adhare kariṣyāmi stana^pṛṣṭhe ca nakha^padam/
GS39kamasutu:1260: ātmanaś ca svayaṃ kṛtvā tvayā kṛtam iti te sakhī^janasya purataḥ kathayiṣyāmi/
GS39kamasutu:1261: sā tvaṃ kim atra vakṣyasi^iti bāla^vibhīṣikair bāla^pratyāyanaiś ca śanair enāṃ pratārayet/
GS39kamasutu:1262: 3.2.25/.dvitīyasyāṃ tṛtīyasyāṃ ca rātrau kiṃ cid adhikaṃ visrambhitāṃ hastena yojayet//(p.204)
GS39kamasutu:1264: 3.2.27/.ūrvoś ca^upari vinyasta^hastaḥ saṃvāhana^kriyāyāṃ siddhāyāṃ krameṇa^ūru^mūlam api saṃvāhayet/
GS39kamasutu:1265: nivārite saṃvāhane ko doṣa ity ākulayed enām/
GS39kamasutu:1278: kālena ca krameṇa vimukta^kanyā^bhāvām anudvejayann upakrameta/
GS39kamasutu:1286: 3.2.32cd/.kanyā^visrambhaṇaṃ vetti yaḥ sa tāsāṃ priyo bhavet//(p.206)
GS39kamasutu:1291: 3.2.34cd/.bhayaṃ vitrāsam udvegaṃ sadyo dveṣaṃ ca gacchati//(p.207)
GS39kamasutu:1299: bāla^vṛttir ucita^praveśo vā kanyām alabhyatvān na varayet/
GS39kamasutu:1302: mātrā ca pitrā ca viyuktaḥ paribhūta^kalpo dhana^utkarṣā^dalabhyāṃ mātula^duhitaram anyasmai vā pūrva^dattāṃ sādhayet/
GS39kamasutu:1304: 3.3.5/.bālāyām evaṃ sati dharma^adhigame saṃvananaṃ ślāghyam iti ghoṭakamukhaḥ//(p.208)
GS39kamasutu:1305: 3.3.6/.tayā saha puṣpa^avacayaṃ grathanaṃ gṛhakaṃ duhitṛkā^krīḍā^yojanaṃ bhakta^pāna^karaṇam iti kurvīta/
GS39kamasutu:1307_1: ṣaṭ^pāṣāṇaka^ādīni ca deśyāni tat^sātmyāt tad^āpta^dāsa^ceṭikābhis tayā ca saha^anukrīḍeta /
GS39kamasutu:1308: 3.3.8/.kṣveḍitakāni sunimīlitakām ārabdhikāṃ lavaṇa^vīthikām anila^tāḍitakāṃ godhūma^puñjikām aṅguli^tāḍitakāṃ sakhībhir anyāni ca deśyāni//(p.209)
GS39kamasutu:1309: 3.3.9/.yāṃ ca viśvāsyām asyāṃ manyeta tayā saha nirantarāṃ prītiṃ kuryāt/
GS39kamasutu:1312: sā hi prīyamāṇā vidita^ākārā^apy apratyādiśantī taṃ tāṃ ca yojayituṃ śaknuyāt/
GS39kamasutu:1316: 3.3.12/.yatra yatra ca kautukaṃ prayojyāyās tad anu praviśya sādhayet/
GS39kamasutu:1317: 3.3.13/.krīḍanaka^dravyāṇi yāny apūrvāṇi yāny anyāsāṃ viralaśo vidyeraṃs tāny asyā ayatnena saṃpādayet/
GS39kamasutu:1318: 3.3.14/.tatra kandukam aneka^bhakti^citram alpa^kāla^antaritam anyad anyac ca saṃdarśayet/
GS39kamasutu:1321_0: 3.3.16 /.kāṣṭha^medhrakayoś ca saṃyuktayoś ca strī^puṃsayor aja^eḍakānāṃ deva^kula^gṛhakānāṃ
GS39kamasutu:1321_2: ca vicitra^ākṛti^saṃyuktānāṃ jala^bhājanānāṃ ca yantrikāṇāṃ vīṇikānāṃ paṭolikānām (p.210)
GS39kamasutu:1323: pūga^phalānāṃ pattrāṇāṃ kāla^yuktānāṃ ca śakti^viṣaye pracchannaṃ dānaṃ prakāśa^dravyāṇāṃ ca prakāśam/
GS39kamasutu:1324: yathā ca sarva^abhiprāya^saṃvardhakam enaṃ manyeta tathā prayatitavyam/
GS39kamasutu:1327: 3.3.18/.pracchanna^dānasya tu kāraṇam ātmano guru^janād bhayaṃ khyāpayet/
GS39kamasutu:1329: 3.3.19/.vardhamāna^anurāgaṃ ca^ākhyānake manaḥ kurvatīm anvarthābhiḥ kathābhiś citta^hāriṇībhiś ca rañjayet/
GS39kamasutu:1331: kalāsu kautukinīṃ tat^kauśalena gīta^priyāṃ śruti^harair gītaiḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1332: āśvayujyām aṣṭamī^candrake kaumudyām utsaveṣu yātrāyāṃ grahaṇe gṛha^ācāre vā vicitrair āpīḍaiḥ *karṇa[ch:
GS39kamasutu:1339: 3.3.24/.yuvatayo hi saṃsṛṣṭam abhīkṣṇa^darśanaṃ ca puruṣaṃ prathamaṃ kāmayante/
GS39kamasutu:1340: kāmayamānā api tu na^abhiyuñjata iti prāyovādaḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1346: pramattaṃ pracchannaṃ nāyakam atikrāntaṃ ca vīkṣate/
GS39kamasutu:1347: 3.3.27/.pṛṣṭā ca kiṃ cit sasmitam avyakta^akṣaram anavasitā^arthaṃ ca mandaṃ mandam adhomukhī kathayati/
GS39kamasutu:1349: dūre sthitā paśyatu mām iti manyamānā parijanaṃ savadana^vikāram ābhāṣate/
GS39kamasutu:1355: parijanānavaṣṭabhya tās tāś ca līlā darśayati/
GS39kamasutu:1357: vacanaṃ ca^eṣāṃ bahu manyate karoti ca/
GS39kamasutu:1358: tat^paricārakaiḥ saha prītiṃ saṃkathāṃ dyūtam iti ca karoti/
GS39kamasutu:1360: teṣu ca nāyaka^saṃkathām anyasya kathayatsv avahitā tāṃ śṛṇoti/
GS39kamasutu:1362: tām antarā kṛtvā tena saha dyūtaṃ krīḍām ālāpaṃ ca^āyojayitum icchati/
GS39kamasutu:1365: karṇa^pattram aṅgulīyakaṃ srajaṃ vā tena yācitā sadhīram eva gātrād avatārya sakhyā haste dadāti/
GS39kamasutu:1378: 3.4.2/.dyūte krīḍanakeṣu ca vivadamānaḥ sākāram asyāḥ pāṇim avalambeta//(p.216)
GS39kamasutu:1382: 3.4.6/.jala^krīḍāyāṃ tad^dūrato +apsu nimagnaḥ samīpam asyā gatvā spṛṣṭvā ca^enāṃ tatra^eva^unmajjet//(p.217)
GS39kamasutu:1396: 3.4.19/.vijane tamasi ca dvandvam āsīnaḥ kṣāntiṃ kruvīta/
GS39kamasutu:1399: 3.4.21/.vivikte ca kiṃ cid asti kathayitavyam ity uktvā nirvacanaṃ bhāvaṃ ca tatra^upalakṣayet/
GS39kamasutu:1401: 3.4.22/.vidita^bhāvas tu vyādhim apadiśya^enāṃ vārtā^grahaṇa^arthaṃ svam udavasitam ānayet//(p.219)
GS39kamasutu:1403: pāṇim avalambya ca^asyāḥ sākāraṃ nayanayor lalāṭe ca nidadhyāt//(p.219)
GS39kamasutu:1406: na hy etad ṛte kanyayā anyena kāryam iti gacchantīṃ punar āgamana^anubandham enāṃ visṛjet//(p.220)
GS39kamasutu:1407: 3.4.26/.asya ca yogasya trirātraṃ trisaṃdhyaṃ ca prayuktiḥ//(p.220)
GS39kamasutu:1409: 3.4.28/.anyābhir api saha viśvāsana^artham adhikam adhikaṃ ca^abhiyuñjīta/
GS39kamasutu:1411: 3.4.29/.dūragata^bhāvo +api hi kanyāsu na nirvedena siddhyati^iti ghoṭakamukhaḥ//(p.220)
GS39kamasutu:1413: 3.4.31/.pradoṣe niśi tamasi ca yoṣito manda^sādhvasāḥ surata^(p.220)
GS39kamasutu:1417: 3.4.32/.eka^puruṣa^abhiyogānāṃ tv asaṃbhave gṛhīta^arthayā dhātreyikayā sakhyā vā tasyām antarbhūtayā tam artham anirvadantyā saha^enām aṅkam ānāyayet/
GS39kamasutu:1419: 3.4.33/.svāṃ vā paricārikām ādāv eva sakhītvena^asyāḥ praṇidadhyāt//(p.221)
GS39kamasutu:1420: 3.4.34/.yajñe vivāhe yātrāyām utsave vyasane prekṣaṇaka^vyāpṛte jane tatra tatra ca dṛṣṭa^iṅgita^ākārāṃ parīkṣita^bhāvām ekākinīm upakrameta/
GS39kamasutu:1421: 3.4.35/.na hi dṛṣṭa^bhāvā yoṣito deśe kāle ca prayujyamānā vyāvartanta iti vātsyāyanaḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1423: 3.4.36/.manda^apadeśā guṇavaty api kanyā dhana^hīnā kulīnā^api samānair ayācyāmānā mātā^pitṛ^viyuktā vā jñāti^kula^vartinī vā prāpta^yauvanā pāṇi^grahaṇaṃ svayam abhīpseta//(p.222)
GS39kamasutu:1425: 3.4.38/.yaṃ vā manyeta mātā^pitror asamīkṣayā svayam apy ayam indriya^daurbalyān mayi pravartiṣyata iti priya^hita^upacārair abhīkṣṇa^saṃdarśanena ca tam āvarjayet//(p.222)
GS39kamasutu:1426: 3.4.39/.mātā ca^enāṃ sakhībhir dhātreyikābhiś ca saha tad^abhimukhīṃ kuryāt//(p.223)
GS39kamasutu:1428: kalā^kauśala^prakāśane vā saṃvāhane śirasaḥ pīḍane ca^aucitya^darśanam/
GS39kamasutu:1429: prayojyasya sātmya^yuktāḥ kathā^yogāḥ bālāyām upakrameṣu yathoktam ācaret//(p.223)
GS39kamasutu:1431: svayam abhiyoginī hi yuvatiḥ saubhāgyaṃ jahāti^ity^ācāryāḥ//(p.223)
GS39kamasutu:1439: 3.4.46/.yadā tu manyeta^anurakto mayi na vyāvartiṣyata iti tadā^eva^enam abhiyuñjānaṃ bāla^bhāva^mokṣāya *tvarayet[ch:tvaret]/
GS39kamasutu:1443: 3.4.48b/.anukūlaṃ ca vaśyaṃ ca tasya kuryāt parigraham//(p.224)
GS39kamasutu:1449: 3.4.51b/.guṇair yukto +api na tv evaṃ bahu^sādhāraṇaḥ patiḥ//(p.225)
GS39kamasutu:1452: 3.4.53a/.nīco yas tv abhiyuñjīta puruṣaḥ palito +api vā/
GS39kamasutu:1455: 3.4.54b/.sapatnīkaś ca sa^apatyo na sa saṃyogam arhati//
GS39kamasutu:1460: 3.5.2/.sā ca^enām aviditā nāma nāyakasya bhūtvā tad^guṇair anurañjayet/
GS39kamasutu:1461: tasyāś ca rucyān nāyaka^guṇān bhūyiṣṭham upavarṇayet/
GS39kamasutu:1463: 3.5.4/.mātā^pitroś ca guṇān abhijñatāṃ lubdhatāṃ ca capalatāṃ ca bāndhavānām/
GS39kamasutu:1464: 3.5.5/.yāś ca^anyā api samāna^jātīyāḥ kanyāḥ śakuntalā^ādyāḥ svabuddhyā bhartāraṃ prāpya saṃprayuktā modante sma tāś ca^asyā nidarśayet/
GS39kamasutu:1470: 3.5.9/.samanorathāyāś ca^asyā apāyaṃ sādhvasaṃ vrīḍāṃ ca hetubhir avacchindyāt/
GS39kamasutu:1472: 3.5.11/.tvām ajānatīm iva nāyako balād grahīṣyati^iti tathā suparigṛhītaṃ syād iti yojayet//(p.227)
GS39kamasutu:1473: 3.5.12/.pratipannām abhipreta^avakāśa^vartinīṃ nāyakaḥ śrotriya^āgārād agnim ānāyya kuśān āstīrya yathāsmṛti hutvā ca triḥ parikramet/
GS39kamasutu:1475: 3.5.14/.agni^sākṣikā hi vivāhā na nivartanta ity ācārya^samayaḥ//(p.228)
GS39kamasutu:1477: 3.5.16/.tad^bāndhavāś ca yathā kulasya^adhaṃ pariharanto daṇḍa^bhayāc ca tasmā eva^enāṃ dadyus tathā yojayet/
GS39kamasutu:1478: 3.5.17/.anantaraṃ ca prīty^upagraheṇa rāgeṇa tad^bāndhavān prīṇayed iti/
GS39kamasutu:1480: 3.5.19/.apratipadyamānāyām antaś cāriṇīm anyāṃ kula^pramadāṃ pūrva^saṃsṛṣṭāṃ prīyamāṇāṃ ca^upagṛhya tayā saha viṣahyam avakāśam enām anya^kārya^apadeśena^ānayayet/
GS39kamasutu:1482: 3.5.21/.āsanne ca vivāhe mātaram asyās tad abhimata^doṣair anuśayaṃ grāhayet/
GS39kamasutu:1483: 3.5.22/.tatas tad^anumatena prātiveśya^abhavane niśi nāyakam ānāyya śrotriya^āgārād agnim iti samānaṃ pūrveṇa//(p.229)
GS39kamasutu:1484: 3.5.23/.bhrātaram asyā vā samāna^vayasaṃ veśyāsu parastrīṣu vā prasaktam asukareṇa sāhāya^dānena priya^upagrahaiś ca sudīrgha^kālam anurañjayet/
GS39kamasutu:1486: 3.5.24/.prāyeṇa hi yuvānaḥ samāna^śīla^vyasana^vayasāṃ vayasyānām arthe jīvitam api tyajanti/
GS39kamasutu:1489: 3.5.25/.aṣṭamī^candrika^ādiṣu ca dhātreyikā madanīyam enāṃ pāyayitvā kiṃ cid ātmanaḥ kāryam uddiśya nāyakasya viṣahyaṃ deśam ānayet/
GS39kamasutu:1490: tatra^enāṃ madāt saṃjñām apratipadyamānāṃ dūṣayitvā^iti samānaṃ pūrveṇa//(p.230)
GS39kamasutu:1491: 3.5.26/.suptāṃ ca^ekacāriṇīṃ dhātreyikāṃ vārayitvā saṃjñām apratipadyamānāṃ dūṣayitvā^iti samānaṃ pūrveṇa//(p.230)
GS39kamasutu:1492: 3.5.27/.grāma^antaram udyānaṃ vā gacchantīṃ viditvā susaṃbhṛta^sahāyo nāyakas tadā rakṣiṇo vitrāsya hatvā vā kanyām apaharet/
GS39kamasutu:1494: 3.5.28a/.pūrvaḥ pūrvaḥ pradhānaṃ syād vivāho dharmataḥ sthiteḥ/(p.231)
GS39kamasutu:1495: 3.5.28b/.pūrva^abhāve tataḥ kāryo yo ya uttara uttaraḥ//(p.231)
GS39kamasutu:1504: 4.1.3/.veśma ca śuci susaṃmṛṣṭa^sthānaṃ viracita^vividha^kusumaṃ ślakṣṇa^bhūmi^talaṃ hṛdya^darśanaṃ triṣavaṇa^ācarita^bali^karma pūjita^deva^āyatanaṃ kuryāt//(p.233)
GS39kamasutu:1506: 4.1.5/.guruṣu bhṛtya^vargeṣu nāyaka^bhaginīṣu tat^patiṣu ca yathā^arhaṃ pratipattiḥ//(p.234)
GS39kamasutu:1508_1: anyāṃś ca bahu^puṣpān bālaka^uśīraka^pātālikāṃś ca vṛkṣa^vāṭikāyāṃ ca sthaṇḍilāni
GS39kamasutu:1511: 4.1.10/.bhojane ca rucitam idam asmai dveṣyam idaṃ pathyam idam apathyam idam iti ca vindyāt//(p.235)
GS39kamasutu:1512: 4.1.11/.svaraṃ bahir upaśrutya bhavanam āgacchataḥ kiṃ kṛtyam iti bruvatī sajjā bhavana^madhye tiṣṭhet//(p.235)
GS39kamasutu:1514: 4.1.13/.nāyakasya ca na vimukta^bhūṣaṇaṃ vijane saṃdarśane tiṣṭhet//(p.235)
GS39kamasutu:1516: 4.1.15/.āvāhe vivāhe yajñe gamanaṃ sakhībhiḥ saha goṣṭhīṃ devatā^abhigamanam ity anujñātā kuryāt//(p.235)
GS39kamasutu:1518: 4.1.17/.paścāt saṃveśanaṃ pūrvam utthānam anavabodhanaṃ ca suptasya//(p.236)
GS39kamasutu:1521: 4.1.20/.sādhikṣepa^vacanaṃ tv enaṃ mitra^jana^madhyastham ekākinaṃ vā^apy upālabheta/
GS39kamasutu:1524: 4.1.22/.durvyāhṛtaṃ durnirīkṣitam anyato mantraṇaṃ dvāra^deśa^avasthānaṃ nirīkṣaṇaṃ vā niṣkuṭeṣu mantraṇaṃ vivikteṣu ciram avasthānam iti varjayet//(p.236)
GS39kamasutu:1526: 4.1.24/.bahu^bhūṣaṇaṃ vividha^kusuma^anulepanaṃ vividha^aṅga^rāga^samujjvalaṃ vāsa ity ābhigāmiko veṣaḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1528: tathā śuklāny anyāni puṣpāṇi^iti vaihāriko veṣaḥ//(p.237)
GS39kamasutu:1529: 4.1.26/.nāyakasya vratam upavāsaṃ ca svayam api karaṇena^anuvarteta/
GS39kamasutu:1530: vāritāyāṃ ca na^aham atra nirbandhanīya^iti tad^vacaso nivartanam//(p.237)
GS39kamasutu:1532: 4.1.28/.tathā lavaṇa^snehayoś ca gandha^dravya^kaṭuka^bhāṇḍa^oṣadhānāṃ ca durlabhānāṃ bhavanesu pracchannaṃ nidhānam//(p.237)
GS39kamasutu:1534: 4.1.30/.svasya ca sārasya parebhyo na^ākhyānaṃ bhartṛ^mantritasya ca//(p.238)
GS39kamasutu:1535: 4.1.31/.samānāś ca striyaḥ kauśalena^ujjvalatayā pākena mānena tathā^upacārair atiśayīta//(p.238)
GS39kamasutu:1548: 4.1.34/.taj^jaghanyānāṃ ca jīrṇa^vāsasāṃ saṃcayas tair vividha^rāgaiḥ śuddhair vā kṛta^karmaṇāṃ paricārakāṇām anugraho māna^artheṣu ca dānam anyatra vā^upayogaḥ//(p.239)
GS39kamasutu:1549: 4.1.35/.surā^kumbhīnām āsava^kumbhīnāṃ ca sthāpanaṃ tad^upayogaḥ kraya^vikrayāv āyavyayā^avekṣaṇam//(p.239)
GS39kamasutu:1556: 4.1.41/.svakarmasu bhṛtyajana^niyamanam utsaveṣu ca^asya pūjanam ity ekacāriṇī^vṛttam//(p.240)
GS39kamasutu:1557: 4.1.42/.pravāse maṅgala^mātra^ābharaṇā devatā^upavāsa^parā vārtāyāṃ sthitā gṛhān avekṣeta//(p.240)
GS39kamasutu:1560: nāyaka^abhimatānāṃ ca^arthānām arjane pratisaṃskāre ca yatnaḥ//(p.240)
GS39kamasutu:1564: tatra^api nāyaka^parijana^adhiṣṭhitāyā na^atikālam avasthānam aparivartita^pravāsa^veṣatā ca//(p.241)
GS39kamasutu:1566: paricārakaiḥ śucibhir ājñā^adhiṣṭhitair anumatena kraya^vikraya^karmaṇā sārasya^āpūraṇaṃ tanū^karaṇaṃ ca śaktyā vyayānām//(p.241)
GS39kamasutu:1567: 4.1.47/.āgate ca prakṛtisthāyā eva prathamato darśanaṃ daivata^pūjanam upahārāṇāṃ ca^āharaṇam iti pravāsa^caryā//
GS39kamasutu:1571: 4.1.49ab/.dharmam arthaṃ tathā kāmaṃ labhante sthānam eva ca/(p.242)
GS39kamasutu:1574: 4.2.1/.jāḍya^dauḥśīlya^daurbhāgyebhyaḥ prajān utpatter ābhīkṣṇyena dārika^utpatter nāyaka^cāpalād vā sapatny^adhivedanam//(p.242)
GS39kamasutu:1576: prajān utpattau ca svayam eva sāpatnake codayet//(p.242)
GS39kamasutu:1577: 4.2.3/.adhividyamānā ca yāvac chakti^yogād ātmano +adhikatvena sthitiṃ kārayet//(p.243)
GS39kamasutu:1579: nāyaka^viditaṃ ca prādoṣikaṃ vidhim atīva yatnād asyāḥ kārayet saubhāgyajaṃ vaikṛtam utsekaṃ vā^asyā na^adriyeta//(p.243)
GS39kamasutu:1581: yatra manyeta^artham iyaṃ svayam api pratipatsyata iti tatra^enām ādarata eva^anuśiṣyāt//(p.243)
GS39kamasutu:1589: 4.2.9/.yāṃ tu nāyako +adhikāṃ cikīrṣet tāṃ bhūta^pūrva^subhagayā protsāhya kalahayet//(p.244)
GS39kamasutu:1591: 4.2.11/.tābhir ekatvena^adhikāṃ cikīrṣitāṃ svayam avivadamānā durjanī kuryāt//(p.244)
GS39kamasutu:1592: 4.2.12/.nāyakena tu kalahitām enāṃ pakṣapātāv alambana^upabṛṃhitām āśvāsayet//(p.244)
GS39kamasutu:1594: 4.2.14/.mandaṃ vā kalaham upalabhya svayam eva saṃdhukṣayet//(p.245)
GS39kamasutu:1595: 4.2.15/.yadi nāyako +asyām adya^api sānunaya iti manyeta tadā svayam eva saṃdhau prayateta^iti jyeṣṭhā^vṛttam//(p.245)
GS39kamasutu:1606: 4.2.26/.tat tu ślāghayā rāgeṇa vā bahir na^acakṣīta//(p.246)
GS39kamasutu:1609: 4.2.29/.durbhagām anapatyāṃ ca jyeṣṭhām anukampeta nāyakena ca^anukampayet//(p.246)
GS39kamasutu:1610: 4.2.30/.prasahya tv enām ekacāriṇī^vṛttam anutiṣṭhed iti kaniṣṭhā^vṛttam//(p.246)
GS39kamasutu:1611: 4.2.31/.vidhavā tv indriya^daurbalyād āturā bhoginaṃ guṇa^saṃpannaṃ ca yā punar vindet sā punarbhūḥ//(p.247)
GS39kamasutu:1612: 4.2.32/.yatas tu svecchayā punar api niṣkramaṇaṃ nirguṇo +ayam iti tadā anyaṃ kāṅkṣed iti bābhravīyāḥ//(p.247)
GS39kamasutu:1614: 4.2.34/.guṇeṣu sopabhogeṣu sukha^sākalyaṃ tasmāt tato viśeṣa iti gonardīyaḥ//(p.247)
GS39kamasutu:1617: 4.2.37/.ātmanaḥ sāreṇa vālaṃkāraṃ tadīyam ātmīyaṃ vā bibhṛyāt//(p.248)
GS39kamasutu:1619: 4.2.39/.svecchayā ca gṛhān nirgacchantī prīti^dāyād anyan nāyaka^dattaṃ jīyeta/
GS39kamasutu:1620: niṣkāsyamānā tu na kiṃ cid dadyāt//(p.248)
GS39kamasutu:1635: 4.2.45/.durbhagā tu sāpatnaka^pīḍitā yā tāsām adhikam iva patyāv upacaret tām āśrayet/
GS39kamasutu:1640: 4.2.47/.tan mitrāṇi ca^upagṛhya tair bhaktim ātmanaḥ prakāśayet//(p.250)
GS39kamasutu:1646: 4.2.52/.yayā ca kalahitaḥ syāt kāmaṃ tām āvartayet//(p.250)
GS39kamasutu:1647: 4.2.53/.yāṃ ca pracchannāṃ kāmayet tām anena saha saṃgamayed gopayec ca//(p.250)
GS39kamasutu:1648: 4.2.54/.yathā ca pativratātvam aśāṭhyaṃ nāyako manyeta tathā prativid adhyād iti durbhagā^vṛttam//(p.251)
GS39kamasutu:1649: 4.2.55/.antaḥpurāṇāṃ ca vṛttam eteṣv eva prakaraṇeṣu lakṣayet//(p.251)
GS39kamasutu:1650: 4.2.56/.mālyā^anulepana^vāsāṃsi ca^āsāṃ kañcukīyā mahattarikā vā rājño nivedayeyur devībhiḥ prahitam iti/
GS39kamasutu:1652: 4.2.58/.alaṃkṛtaś ca svalaṃkṛtāni ca^aparāhṇe sarvāṇy antaḥpurāṇya^ekadhyena paśyet//(p.251)
GS39kamasutu:1653: 4.2.59/.tāsāṃ yathā^kālaṃ yathā^arhaṃ ca sthāna^māna^anuvṛttiḥ saparihāsāś ca kathāḥ kuryāt//(p.251)
GS39kamasutu:1657_0: 4.2.63 /.vāsaka^pālyas tu yasyā vāsako yasyāś ca^atīto yasyāś ca ṛtus tat^paricārika^anugatā
GS39kamasutu:1657_1: divā śayyā^utthitasya rājñas tābhyāṃ prahitam aṅgulīyaka^aṅkam anulepanam ṛtuṃ vāsakaṃ
GS39kamasutu:1658: 4.2.64/.tatra rājā yad gṛhṇīyāt tasyā vāsakam ājñāpayet//(p.252)
GS39kamasutu:1665: 4.2.67ab/.puruṣas tu bahūn dārān samāhṛtya samo bhavet/(p.253)
GS39kamasutu:1666: 4.2.67cd/.na ca^avajñāṃ cared āsu vyalīkān na saheta ca//(p.253)
GS39kamasutu:1668: 4.2.68cd/.visrambhād vā^apy upālambhas tam anyāsu na kīrtayet//(p.253)
GS39kamasutu:1669: 4.2.69ab/.na dadyāt prasaraṃ strīṇāṃ sapatnyāḥ kāraṇe kva cit/(p.253)
GS39kamasutu:1672: 4.2.70cd/.bahu^mānais tathā ca^anyām ity evaṃ rañjayet striyaḥ//(p.253)
GS39kamasutu:1678: 5.1.strīpuruṣaśīlavasthāpanaṃ vyāvartanakāraṇāṇi strīṣu siddhāḥ puruṣā ayatnasādhyā yoṣitaḥ
GS39kamasutu:1680: 5.1.2/.teṣu sādhyatvam anatyayaṃ gamyatvam āyatiṃ vṛttiṃ ca^ādita eva parīkṣeta//
GS39kamasutu:1681: 5.1.3/.yadā tu sthānāt sthāna^antaraṃ kāmaṃ pratipadyamānaṃ paśyet tad^ātma^śarīra^upaghāta^trāṇa^arthaṃ para^parigrahān abhyupagacchet//(p.255)
GS39kamasutu:1683: 5.1.5/.cakṣuḥ^prītir manaḥ^saṅgaḥ saṃkalpa^utpattir nidrā^ācchedas tanutā viṣayebhyo vyāvṛttir lajjā^praṇāśa unmādo mūrchā maraṇam iti teṣāṃ liṅgāni//(p.256)
GS39kamasutu:1684: 5.1.6/.tatra^ākṛtito lakṣaṇataś ca yuvatyāḥ śīlaṃ satyaṃ śaucaṃ sādhyatāṃ caṇḍa^vegatāṃ ca lakṣayed ity ācāryāḥ//(p.256)
GS39kamasutu:1685: 5.1.7/.vyabhicārād ākṛti^lakṣaṇa^yogānām iṅgita^ākārābhyām eva pravṛttir boddhavyā yoṣita iti vātsyāyanaḥ//(p.256)
GS39kamasutu:1686: 5.1.8/.yaṃ kaṃ cid ujjvalaṃ puruṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā strī kāmayate/
GS39kamasutu:1691: 5.1.10/.na strī dharmam adharmaṃ ca^apekṣate kāmayata eva/
GS39kamasutu:1695: 5.1.13/.puruṣas tu dharma^sthitim ārya^samayaṃ ca^apekṣya kāmayamāno +api vyāvartate/
GS39kamasutu:1736_0: kathā^ākhyāna^kuśalo bālyāt prabhṛti saṃsṛṣṭaḥ pravṛddha^yauvanaḥ krīḍana^karma^ādinā^āgata^viśvāsaḥ
GS39kamasutu:1736_1: preṣaṇasya kartā^ucita^saṃbhāṣaṇaḥ priyasya kartā^anyasya bhūta^pūrvo dūto marmajña
GS39kamasutu:1736_2: uttamayā prārthitaḥ sakhyā pracchannaṃ saṃsṛṣṭaḥ subhaga^abhikhyātaḥ saha saṃvṛddhaḥ
GS39kamasutu:1738: nava^varakaḥ prekṣa^udyāna^tyāga^śīlo vṛṣa iti siddha^pratāpaḥ sāhasikaḥ śūro vidyā^rūpa^guṇa^upabhogaiḥ patyur atiśayitā mahārha^veṣa^upacāraś ca^iti//(p.261)
GS39kamasutu:1760: 5.1.54/.kanyā^kāle yatnena varitā kathaṃ cid alabdha^abhiyuktā ca sā tadānīṃ samāna^buddhi^śīla^medhā^pratipatti^sātmyā/
GS39kamasutu:1774: para^striyas tu sūkṣma^bhāvā dūtī^sādhyā na tathā^ātmanā^ity ācāryāḥ//(p.265)
GS39kamasutu:1775: 5.2.2/.sarvatra śakti^viṣaye svayaṃ sādhanam upapannatarakaṃ durupapādatvāt tasya dūtī^prayoga iti vātsyāyanaḥ//(p.265)
GS39kamasutu:1778: 5.2.4/.svayam abhiyokṣyamāṇas tv ādāv eva paricayaṃ kuryāt//(p.265)
GS39kamasutu:1781_0: 5.2.7 /.darśane ca^asyāḥ satataṃ sākāraṃ prekṣaṇaṃ keśa^saṃyamanaṃ nakhāc churaṇam
GS39kamasutu:1781_1: ābharaṇa^prahlādanam adhara^oṣṭha^vimardanaṃ tās tāś ca līlā vayasyaiḥ saha prekṣamāṇāyās
GS39kamasutu:1781_2: tat^saṃbaddhāḥ para^apadeśinyaś ca kathās tyāga^upabhoga^prakāśanaṃ sakhyur utsaṅga^niṣaṇṇasya
GS39kamasutu:1781_3: sāṅga^bhaṅgaṃ jṛṃbhaṇam ekabhrū^kṣepaṇaṃ manda^vākyatā tad^vākya^śravaṇaṃ tām uddiśya
GS39kamasutu:1782_0: bālena^anya^janena vā sahānya^upadiṣṭā dvyarthā kathā tasyāṃ svayaṃ manoratha^avedanam
GS39kamasutu:1782_1: anya^apadeśena tām eva^uddiśya bāla^cumbanam āliṅganaṃ ca jihvayā ca^asya tāmbūla^dānaṃ
GS39kamasutu:1782_2: pradeśinyā hanu^deśa^ghaṭṭanaṃ tat tad yathā^yogaṃ yathā^avakāśaṃ ca prayoktavyam /
GS39kamasutu:1783_0: 5.2.8 /.tasyāś ca^aṅkagatasya bālasya lālanaṃ bāla^krīḍanakānāṃ ca^asya dānaṃ grahaṇaṃ
GS39kamasutu:1783_1: tena saṃnikṛṣṭatvāt kathā^yojanaṃ tat^saṃbhāṣaṇa^kṣameṇa janena ca prītim āsādya
GS39kamasutu:1783_2: kāryaṃ tad^anubandhaṃ ca gamana^agamanasya yojanaṃ saṃśraye ca^asyās tām apaśyato
GS39kamasutu:1784: 5.2.9/.prasṛte tu paricaye tasyā haste nyāsaṃ nikṣepaṃ ca nidadhyāt/
GS39kamasutu:1787: 5.2.10/.tām ātmano dāraiḥ saha visrambha^goṣṭhyāṃ vivikta^āsane ca yojayet
GS39kamasutu:1789: 5.2.12/.suvarṇakāra^maṇikāra^vaikaṭika^nīlīkusumbha^rañjka^ādiṣu ca kāma^arthinyāṃ saha^ātmano vaśyaiś ca^eṣāṃ tat^saṃpādane svayaṃ prayateta/
GS39kamasutu:1792: 5.1.15/.yena karmaṇā dravyeṇa kauśalena ca^arthinī syāt tasya prayogam utpattim āgamam upāyaṃ vijñānaṃ ca^ātma^āyattaṃ darśayet/
GS39kamasutu:1793: 5.2.16/.pūrva^pravṛtteṣu loka^cariteṣu dravya^guṇa^parīkṣāsu ca tayā tat^parijanena ca saha vivādaḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1794: 5.2.17/.tatra nirdiṣṭāni paṇitāni teṣv enāṃ prāśnikatvena yojayet/
GS39kamasutu:1795: 5.2.18/.tayā tu vivadamāno +atyantād bhutam iti brūyād iti paricaya^kāraṇāni//(p.268)
GS39kamasutu:1807: 5.2.24/.krameṇa ca vivikta^deśe gamanam āliṅganaṃ cumbanaṃ tāmbūlasya grāhaṇaṃ dāna^ante dravyāṇāṃ parivartanaṃ guhya^deśa^abhimarśanaṃ ca^ity abhiyogāḥ//(p.270)
GS39kamasutu:1809: tatra yā vṛddha^anubhūta^viṣayā priya^upagrahaiś ca tām upagṛhṇīyāt//
GS39kamasutu:1812: 5.2.27cd/.na tatra yoṣitaṃ kāṃ cit suprāpām api laṅghayet//(p.270)
GS39kamasutu:1820: 5.3.3/.apratigṛhya^abhiyogaṃ punar api saṃsṛjyamānāṃ dvidhā bhūta^mānasāṃ vidyāt/
GS39kamasutu:1822: 5.3.4/.apratigṛhya^abhiyogaṃ saviśeṣam alaṃkṛtā ca punar dṛśyeta tathā^eva tam abhigacchec ca vivikte balād grahaṇīyāṃ vidyāt//(p.271)
GS39kamasutu:1823: 5.3.5/.bahūn api viṣa^hate +abhiyogān na ca cireṇa^api prayacchaty ātmānaṃ sā śuṣka^pratigrāhiṇī paricaya^vighaṭana^sādhyā//(p.272)
GS39kamasutu:1833: 5.3.10/.kāraṇāt saṃsparśanaṃ sahate na^avabudhyate nāma dvidhā^bhūta^mānasā sātatyena kṣāntyā vā sādhyā/(p.273)
GS39kamasutu:1834: 5.3.11/.samīpe śayānāyāḥ supto nāma karam upari vinyaset/
GS39kamasutu:1841: 5.3.15/.ciram adṛṣṭā^api prakṛtisthā^eva saṃsṛjyate kṛta^lakṣaṇāṃ tāṃ darśita^ākārām upakramet//(p.274)
GS39kamasutu:1846: śiraḥ^pīḍane saṃvāhane ca^ūrvor ātmānaṃ nāyake niyojayati/
GS39kamasutu:1847: 5.3.17/.āturā saṃvāhikā ca^ekena hastena saṃvāhayantī dvitīyena bāhunā sparśam āvedayati śleṣayati ca/
GS39kamasutu:1857: 5.3.21/.vivikte bhāvaṃ darśayati niṣkāraṇaṃ ca^agūḍham anyatra pracchanna^pradeśāt/
GS39kamasutu:1858: 5.3.22/.saṃnikṛṣṭa^paricāraka^upabhogyā sā ced ākāritā^api tathā^eva syāt sā marmajñayā dūtyā sādhyā/
GS39kamasutu:1866: 5.3.26cd/.kṣipram eva^abhiyojyā sā prathame tv eva darśane//(p.275)
GS39kamasutu:1867: 5.3.27ab/.ślakṣṇam ākāritā yā tu darśayet sphuṭam uttaram/(p.275)
GS39kamasutu:1870: 5.3.28cd/.eṣa sūkṣmo vidhiḥ proktaḥ siddhā eva sphuṭaṃ striyaḥ//(p.276)
GS39kamasutu:1873_1: kavi^kathābhiḥ pāra^dārika^kathābhiś ca tasyāś ca rūpa^vijñāna^dākṣiṇya^śīla^anupraśaṃsābhiś ca tāṃ rañjayet /
GS39kamasutu:1874: 5.4.3/.katham evaṃ vidhāyās tava^ayam ithaṃbhūtaḥ patir^iti ca^anuśayaṃ grāhayet/
GS39kamasutu:1875: 5.4.4/.na tava subhage dāsyam api kartuṃ yukta iti brūyāt/
GS39kamasutu:1876: 5.4.5/.manda^vegatām īrṣyālutāṃ śaṭhatām akṛtajñatāṃ ca^asaṃbhoga^śīlatāṃ kadaryatāṃ capalatām anyāni ca yāni tasmin guptāny asyā abhyāśe sati sadbhāve +atiśayena bhāṣeta/
GS39kamasutu:1881: 5.4.9/.nāyikāyā eva tu viśvāsyatām upalabhya dūtītvena^upasarpayet prathama^sāhasāyāṃ sūkṣma^bhāvāyāṃ ca^iti goṇikāputraḥ//(p.277)
GS39kamasutu:1882: 5.4.10/.sā nāyakasya caritam anulomatāṃ kāmitāni ca kathayet/
GS39kamasutu:1885: tvāṃ kila dṛṣṭvā^amutra^asāv itthaṃ gotra^putro nāyakaś citta^unmādam anubhavati/
GS39kamasutu:1886: prakṛtyā sukumāraḥ kadā cid anyatra^aparikliṣṭa^pūrvas tapasvī/
GS39kamasutu:1887: tato +adhunā śakyam anena maraṇam apy anubhavitum iti varṇayet/
GS39kamasutu:1888: 5.4.13/.tatra siddhā dvitīye +ahani vāci vaktre dṛṣṭyāṃ ca prasādam upalakṣya punar api kathāṃ pravartayet/
GS39kamasutu:1889: 5.4.14/.śṛṇvatyāṃ ca^ahalyā^avimāraka^śākuntalā^ādīny anyāny api laukikāni ca kathayet tad^yuktāni/
GS39kamasutu:1892: ca^asya pracchannaṃ saṃprayogaṃ bhūtam abhūta^pūrvaṃ vā varṇayet/
GS39kamasutu:1897: omits] bhuktaṃ kva ceṣṭitaṃ kiṃ vā kṛtam iti pṛcchati/
GS39kamasutu:1904: 5.4.26/.sādhuvādinī satī kim idam aśobhanam abhidhatsa iti kathām anubadhnāti/
GS39kamasutu:1906: 5.4.28/.pūrva^pravṛttaṃ ca tat^saṃdarśanaṃ kathā^abhiyogaṃ ca svayam akathayantī tayā^ucyamānam ākāṅkṣati/
GS39kamasutu:1915: 5.4.36/.tāsāṃ manoharāṇy upāyanāni tāmbūlam anulepanaṃ srajam aṅgulīyakaṃ vāso vā tena prahitaṃ darśayet/
GS39kamasutu:1916: 5.4.37/.teṣu nāyakasya yathā^arthaṃ nakha^daśana^padāni tāni tāni ca cihnāni syuḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1923_0: 5.4.42 /.sa tu devatā^abhigamane yātrāyām udyāna^krīḍāyāṃ jala^avataraṇe vivāhe yajña^vyasana^utsaveṣv
GS39kamasutu:1923_1: agny^utpāte caura^vibhrame janapadasya cakra^ārohaṇe prekṣā^vyāpāreṣu teṣu teṣu ca
GS39kamasutu:1925: 5.4.44/.tasyā eva tu gehe vidita^niṣkrama^praveśe cintitā^atyaya^pratīkāre praveśanam upapannaṃ niṣkramaṇam avijñāta^kālaṃ ca tan nityaṃ sukha^upāyaṃ ca^iti vātsyāyanaḥ//(p.282)
GS39kamasutu:1926: 5.4.45/.nisṛṣṭa^arthā parimita^arthā patra^hārī svayaṃ^dūtī mūḍha^dūtī bhāryā^dūtī mūka^dūtī vāta^dūtī ca^iti dūtī^viśeṣāḥ//(p.282)
GS39kamasutu:1927: 5.4.46/.nāyakasya nāyikāyāś ca yathā^manīṣitam artham upalabhya sva^buddhyā kārya^saṃpādinī nisṛṣṭa^arthā//(p.282)
GS39kamasutu:1930: 5.4.49/.kautukāc ca^anurūpau yuktāv imau parasparasya^ity asaṃstutayor api//(p.283)
GS39kamasutu:1935: 5.4.54/.dautyena prahita^anyayā svayam eva nāyakam abhigacched ajānatī nāma tena saha^upabhogaṃ svapne vā kathayet/
GS39kamasutu:1940: mama bhāryāyā kā ramanīyā^iti vivikte paryanuyuñjīta sā svayaṃ^dūtī/
GS39kamasutu:1942: 5.4.56/.pratigraha^cchalena^anyām abhisaṃdhāya^asyāḥ saṃdeśa^śrāvaṇa^dvāreṇa nāyakaṃ sādhayet tāṃ ca^upahanyāt sā^api svayaṃ^dūtī/
GS39kamasutu:1950: tena dvāreṇa nāyakam ākārayet sā mūḍha^dūtī//(p.285)
GS39kamasutu:1952: 5.4.60/.sva^bhāryāṃ vā mūḍhāṃ prayojya tayā saha viśvāsena yojayitvā tayā^eva^ākārayet/
GS39kamasutu:1957: tatra sraji karṇa^pattre vā gūḍha^lekha^nidhānaṃ nakha^daśana^padaṃ vā sā mūka^dūtī/
GS39kamasutu:1959: 5.4.62/.pūrva^prastuta^artha^liṅga^saṃbaddham anya^jana^agrahaṇīyaṃ laukika^arthaṃ dvyarthaṃ vā vacanam udāsīnā yā śrāvayet sā vāta^dūtī/
GS39kamasutu:1960: tasyā api tayā^eva pratyuttara^prārthanam iti tāsāṃ viśeṣāḥ//
GS39kamasutu:1972: mahājanena hi caritam eṣāṃ dṛśyate +anuvidhīyate ca//(p.288)
GS39kamasutu:1973: 5.5.2/.savitāram udyantaṃ trayo lokāḥ paśyanti anūdyante ca/
GS39kamasutu:1975: 5.5.3/.tasmād aśakyatvād garhaṇīyatvāc ca^iti na te vṛthā kiṃ cid ācareyuḥ//(p.288)
GS39kamasutu:1979_2: dravyāṇāṃ kraya^vikraya^vinimayeṣu teṣu teṣu ca karmasu saṃprayogaḥ //(p.289)
GS39kamasutu:1986_1: pṛthag bhoga^avāsakān praviśya kathābhir āsitvā pūjitāḥ prapītāś ca^upapradoṣaṃ niṣkrāmayeyuḥ //(p.290)
GS39kamasutu:1987: 5.5.13/.tatra praṇihitā rāja^dāsī prayojyāyāḥ pūrva^saṃsṛṣṭā tāṃ tatra (p.290)
GS39kamasutu:1991: amuṣyāṃ krīḍāyāṃ tava rāja^bhavana^sthānāni rāmanīyakāni darśayiṣyāmi^iti kāle ca yojayet/
GS39kamasutu:1993_1: citra^karmāṇi krīḍā^mṛgān yantrāṇi śakunān vyāghra^siṃha^pañjara^ādīni ca yāni purastād varṇitāni syuḥ /
GS39kamasutu:1997: 5.5.20/.apratipadyamānāṃ svayam eva^īśvara āgatya^upacāraiḥ sānvitāṃ rañjayitvā saṃbhūya ca sa^anurāgaṃ visṛjet/
GS39kamasutu:1998: 5.5.21/.prayojyāyāś ca patyur anugraha^ucitasya dārān nityam antaḥpuram aucityāt praveśayet/
GS39kamasutu:2001: 5.5.22/.antaḥpurikā vā prayojyayā saha svaceṭikā saṃpreṣaṇena prītiṃ kuryāt/
GS39kamasutu:2003: praviṣṭāṃ pūjitāṃ pīta^vartīm praṇihitā rāja^dāsī^iti samānaṃ pūrveṇa/
GS39kamasutu:2004: 5.5.23/.yasmin vā vijñāne prayojyā vikhyātā syāt tad darśana^artham antaḥpurikā sa^upacāraṃ tām āhvayet/
GS39kamasutu:2006: 5.5.24/.udbhūtān arthasya bhītasya vā bhāryāṃ bhikṣukī brūyāt asāv antaḥpurikā rājani siddhā gṛhīta^vākyā mama vacanaṃ śṛṇoti/
GS39kamasutu:2009: sā ca te bhartur mahā^antam anarthaṃ nivartayiṣyati^iti pratipannāṃ dvis trir iti praveśayet/
GS39kamasutu:2012: ca saṃprahṛṣṭāṃ praṇihitā rāja^dāsī^iti samānaṃ pūrveṇa/
GS39kamasutu:2013: 5.5.25/.etayā vṛtty^arthināṃ mahāmātra^abhitaptānāṃ balād vigṛhītānāṃ vyavahāre durbalānāṃ sva^bhogena^asaṃtuṣṭānāṃ rājani prīti^kāmānāṃ rājya^janeṣu paṅkti(vyakti)
GS39kamasutu:2014: m icchatāṃ sajātair bādhyamānānāṃ sajātān bādhitukāmānāṃ sūcakānām anyeṣāṃ kārya^vaśināṃ jāyā vyākhyātāḥ//(p.292)
GS39kamasutu:2015: 5.5.26/.anyena vā prayojyāṃ saha saṃsṛṣṭāṃ saṃgrāhya dāsyam upanītāṃ krameṇa^antaḥpuraṃ praveśayet/
GS39kamasutu:2016: 5.5.27/.praṇidhinā ca^āyatim asyāḥ saṃdūṣya rājani vidviṣṭa iti kalatra^avagraha^upāyena^enām antaḥpuraṃ praveśayed iti pracchanna^yogāḥ/
GS39kamasutu:2019: 5.5.29/.ābhīraṃ hi koṭṭa^rājaṃ para^bhavana^gataṃ bhrātṛ^prayukto rajako jaghāna/
GS39kamasutu:2022: 5.5.31/.prattā janapada^kanyā daśame +ahani kiṃcid aupāyanikam upagṛhya praviśanty antaḥpuram upabhuktā eva visṛjyanta ity āndhrāṇām/
GS39kamasutu:2023: 5.5.32/.mahāmātra^iṣvarāṇām antaḥpurāṇi niśi sevā^arthaṃ rājānam upagacchanti vātsagulmakānām/
GS39kamasutu:2024: 5.5.33/.rūpavatīr janapada^yoṣitaḥ prīty^apadeśena māsaṃ māsā^ardhaṃ vā^ativāsayanty antaḥpurikā vaidarbhāṇām/
GS39kamasutu:2025: 5.5.34/.darśanīyāḥ svabhāryāḥ prīti^dāyām eva mahāmātra^rājabhyo dadaty aparāntakānām/
GS39kamasutu:2027: nagara^striyo janapada^striyaś ca saṅghaśa ekaśaś ca rāja^kulaṃ praviśanti saurāṣṭrakāṇām iti//
GS39kamasutu:2031: 5.5.37ab/.na tv eva^etān prayuñjīta rājā lokahite rataḥ/(p.295)
GS39kamasutu:2034: 5.6.1/.na^antaḥpurāṇāṃ rakṣaṇa^yogāt puruṣa^saṃdarśanaṃ vidyate patyuś ca^ekatvād aneka^sādhāraṇatvāc ca^atṛptiḥ/
GS39kamasutu:2035: tasmāt tāni prayogata eva parasparaṃ rañjayeyuḥ//(p.296)
GS39kamasutu:2036: 5.6.2/.dhātreyikāṃ sakhīṃ dāsīṃ vā puruṣavad alaṃkṛtya^ākṛtisaṃyuktaiḥ kanda^mūla^phala^avayavair apadravyair vā^ātma^abhiprāyāṃ nirvartayeyuḥ//(p.296)
GS39kamasutu:2038: 5.6.4/.rājānaś ca kṛpā^śīlā vinā^api bhāva^yogād āyojita^apadravyā yāvad artham ekayā rātryā bahvībhir api gacchanti/
GS39kamasutu:2039: yasyāṃ tu prītir vāsaka ṛtuv vā tatra^abhiprāyataḥ pravartanta iti prācya^upacārāḥ//(p.297)
GS39kamasutu:2040: 5.6.5/.strī^yogeṇa^eva puruṣāṇām apy alabdha^vṛttīnāṃ viyoniṣu vijātiṣu strī^pratimāsu kevala^upamardanāc ca^abhiprāya^nivṛttir vyākhyātā//(p.297)
GS39kamasutu:2041: 5.6.6/.yoṣav eṣāṃś ca nāgarakān prayeṇa antaḥpurikāḥ paricārikābhiḥ saha praveśayanti/
GS39kamasutu:2042: 5.6.7/.teṣām upāvartane dhātreyikāś ca abhyantara^saṃsṛṣṭā āyatiṃ darśayantyaḥ prayateran/
GS39kamasutu:2043: 5.6.8/.sukha^praveśitām apasāra^bhūmiṃ viśālatāṃ veśmanaḥ pramādaṃ rakṣiṇām anityatāṃ parijanasya varṇayeyuḥ/
GS39kamasutu:2045: 5.6.10/.nāgārakas tu suprāpam apy antaḥpuram apāya^bhūyiṣṭhatvān na praviśed iti vātsyāyanaḥ//(p.298)
GS39kamasutu:2046_1: proṣitā^rājakaṃ kāraṇāni samīkṣya bahuśa āhūyamāno +artha^buddhyā kakṣyā^praveśaṃ
GS39kamasutu:2046_2: ca dṛṣṭvā tābhir eva vihita^upāyaḥ praviśet /
GS39kamasutu:2048: 5.6.13/.bahiś ca rakṣibhir anyad eva kāraṇam apadiśya saṃsṛjyeta/
GS39kamasutu:2049: 5.6.14/.antaś^cāriṇyāṃ ca paricārikāyāṃ vidita^arthāyāṃ saktam ātmānaṃ rūpayet/
GS39kamasutu:2050: tad alābhāc ca śokam antaḥpraveśinībhiś ca dūtī^kalpaṃ sakalam ācaret/ (p.298)
GS39kamasutu:2052: 5.6.16/.dūtyās tv asaṃcāre yatra gṛhīta^ākārāyāḥ prayojyāyā darśana^yogas tatra^avasthānam/
GS39kamasutu:2055: 5.6.19/.yatra saṃpāto +asyās tatra citra^karmaṇas tad yuktasya vyarthānāṃ gīta^vastukānāṃ krīḍanakānāṃ kṛta^cihnānām āpīnakānā(kasya)
GS39kamasutu:2059: 5.6.21/.yatra ca^asyā niyataṃ gamanam iti vidyāt tatra pracchannasya prāg eva^avasthānam/
GS39kamasutu:2063: 5.6.25/.tatra^ayaṃ prayogaḥ --- nakula^hṛdayaṃ coraka^tumbī^phalāni sarpākṣīṇi ca^antardhūmena pacet/
GS39kamasutu:2079: 5.6.29/.tatra rāja^kula^cāriṇya eva lakṣaṇyān puruṣān antaḥpuraṃ praveśayanti na^atisurakṣatvād āparāntikānām/
GS39kamasutu:2082: 5.6.32/.svair eva putrair antaḥpurāṇi kāmacārair jananī^varjam upayujyante vaidarbhakāṇām/
GS39kamasutu:2083: 5.6.33/.tathā praveśibhir eva jñātisaṃbandhibhir na^anyair upayujyante strairājakānām/
GS39kamasutu:2085: 5.6.35/.parispandāḥ karma^karāś ca^antaḥpureṣv aniṣiddhā anye +api tad^rūpāś ca saindhavānām/
GS39kamasutu:2086: 5.6.36/.arthena rakṣiṇam upagṛhya sāhasikāḥ saṃhatāḥ praviśanti haimavatānām/
GS39kamasutu:2096: 5.6.41/.te hi bhayena ca^arthena ca^anyaṃ prayojayeyus tasmāt kāma^bhaya^artha^upadhā^śuddhān iti goṇikāputraḥ/
GS39kamasutu:2097: 5.6.42/.adroho dharmas tam api bhayāj jahyād ato dharma^bhaya^upadhā^śuddhān iti vātsyāyanaḥ//(p.303)
GS39kamasutu:2098: 5.6.43/.para^vākya^abhidhāyinībhiś ca gūḍha^ākārābhiḥ pramadābhir ātmadārān upadadhyāc chauca^aśauca^parijñāna^artham iti bābhravīyāḥ/
GS39kamasutu:2099: 5.6.44/.duṣṭānāṃ yuvatiṣu siddhatvān na^akasmād aduṣṭa^dūṣaṇam ācared iti vātsyāyanaḥ//(p.303)
GS39kamasutu:2101: pravāse +avasthānaṃ videśe nivāsaḥ svavṛtty^upaghātaḥ svairiṇī^saṃsargaḥ patyur īrṣyālutā ca^iti strīṇāṃ vināśa^kāraṇāni//(p.304)
GS39kamasutu:2103: 5.6.46b/.na yāti cchalanāṃ kaścit svadārān prati śāstravit//(p.304)
GS39kamasutu:2116: 6.1.7/.nityam alaṃkāra^yoginī rāja^mārga^avalokinī dṛśyamānā na ca^ativivṛtā tiṣṭhet/
GS39kamasutu:2118: 6.1.8/.yair nāyakam āvarjayed anyābhyaś ca^avacchindyād ātmanaś ca^anarthaṃ pratikuryād arthaṃ ca sādhayen na ca gamyaiḥ paribhūyeta tān sahāyān kuryāt/
GS39kamasutu:2119_0: 6.1.9 /.te tv ārakṣaka^puruṣā dharma^adhikaraṇasthā daivajñā vikrāntāḥ śūrāḥ samāna^vidyāḥ
GS39kamasutu:2119_2: ās te ca te ca kārya^yogāt //(p.307)
GS39kamasutu:2120: 6.1.10/.kevala^arthās tv amī gamyāḥ --- svatantraḥ pūrve vayasi vartamāno vittavān aparokṣavṛttir adhikaraṇavān akṛcchra^adhigata^vittaḥ/
GS39kamasutu:2121: saṃgharṣavān saṃtatāyaḥ subhaga^mānī ślāghanakaḥ ṣaṇḍakaś ca puṃ^śabda^arthī/
GS39kamasutu:2123: rājani mahāmātre vā siddho daiva^pramāṇo vitta^(p.307)
GS39kamasutu:2125: savitta eka^putro liṅgī pracchanna^kāmaḥ śūro vaidyaś ca^iti//(p.308)
GS39kamasutu:2128_0: pragalbho vividha^śilpajño vṛddha^darśī sthūla^lakṣo mahā^utsāho dṛḍha^bhaktir anasūyakas
GS39kamasutu:2128_2: prāṇa^vāna^madyapo vṛṣo maitraḥ strīṇāṃ praṇetā lālayitā ca /
GS39kamasutu:2131_0: 6.1.13 /.nāyikāyāḥ punā rūpa^yauvana^lakṣaṇa^mādhurya yoginī guṇeṣv anuraktā na tathā^artheṣu
GS39kamasutu:2131_1: prīti^saṃyoga^śīlā sthiram atireka^jātīyā viśeṣa^arthinī nityam akadarya^vṛttir goṣṭhī^kalā^priyā
GS39kamasutu:2134_1: gurujana^parityaktaḥ steno dambha^śīlo mūla^karmaṇi prasakto māna^apamānayor anapekṣī
GS39kamasutu:2134_2: dveṣyair apy artha^hāryo vilajja ity agamyāḥ //(p.310)
GS39kamasutu:2135_0: 6.1.17 /.rāgo bhayam arthaḥ saṃgharṣo vaira^niryātanaṃ jijñāsā pakṣaḥ khedo gharmo
GS39kamasutu:2135_1: yaśo +anukampā suhṛd^vākyaṃ hrīḥ priya^sādṛśyaṃ dhanyatā rāga^apanayaḥ sājātyaṃ sāhaveśyaṃ
GS39kamasutu:2143: 6.1.22/.bhāva^jijñāsā^arthaṃ praicāraka^mukhān saṃvāhaka^gāyana^vaihāsikān gamye tadbhaktān vā praṇidadhyāt/
GS39kamasutu:2145: tebhyo nāyakasya śauca^aśaucaṃ rāga^aparāgau sakta^asaktāṃ dāna^adāne ca vidyāt/
GS39kamasutu:2147: 6.1.25/.lāvaka^kukkuṭa^meṣa^yuddha^śuka^śārikā^pralāpana^prekṣaṇaka^kalā^ vyapadeśena pīṭhamardo nāyakaṃ tasyā udavasitam ānayet/
GS39kamasutu:2149: 6.1.27/.āgatasya prīti^kautuka^jananaṃ kiṃ cid dravya^jātaṃ svayam idam asādhāraṇa^upabhogyam iti prīti^dāyaṃ dadyāt/
GS39kamasutu:2150: 6.1.28/.yatra ca ramate tayā goṣṭhya^enam upacāraiś ca rañjayet//(p.313)
GS39kamasutu:2151: 6.1.29/.gate ca saparihāsa^pralāpāṃ sa^upāyanāṃ paricārikām abhikṣṇaṃ preṣayet/
GS39kamasutu:2152: 6.1.30/.sapīṭhamardāyāś ca kāraṇa^apadeśena svayaṃ gamanam iti gamya^upāvartanam//
GS39kamasutu:2159: 6.1.33cd/.gamyena saha saṃsṛṣṭā rañjayet taṃ tataḥ param//(p.314)
GS39kamasutu:2162: 6.2.2/.rañjayen na tu sajjeta saktavac ca viceṣṭeta^iti saṃkṣepa^uktiḥ/
GS39kamasutu:2167: 6.2.7/.tatra tu nāyikāyāḥ saṃtatam aratir nirvedo vrīḍā^bhayaṃ ca/
GS39kamasutu:2169: 6.2.9/.vyādhiṃ ca^ekam animittam ajugupsitam acakṣurgrāhyam anityaṃ ca khyāpayet/
GS39kamasutu:2171: 6.2.11/.nirmālyasya tu nāyikā ceṭikāṃ preṣayet tāmbūlasya ca//(p.315)
GS39kamasutu:2182: rāja^mārge ca prāsādasthāyās tatra viditāyā vrīḍā^śāṭhya^nāśaḥ/
GS39kamasutu:2199: 6.2.30/.niḥśvāse jṛmbhite skhalite patite vā tasya ca^ārtim āśaṃsīta/
GS39kamasutu:2207: 6.2.38/.tena saha deśa^mokṣaṃ rocayed rājani niṣkrayaṃ ca/(p.317)
GS39kamasutu:2213: glānyām urasi lalāṭe ca karaṃ kurvīta/
GS39kamasutu:2220: 6.2.46/.vratam upavāsaṃ ca^asya nirvartayet mayi doṣa iti/
GS39kamasutu:2230: 6.2.54/.sa eva ca me syād ity aurdhva^dehikeṣu vacanam/
GS39kamasutu:2234: 6.2.58/.balāt kāreṇa ca yady anyatra tayā nīyeta tadā viṣama^naśanaṃ śastraṃ rajjum iti kāmayeta/
GS39kamasutu:2254: 6.2.73/.nisṛṣṭa^bhāvaḥ samāna^vṛttiḥ prayojana^kārī nirāśaṅko nirapekṣo +artheṣv iti sakta^lakṣaṇāni//(p.322)
GS39kamasutu:2256: anuktaṃ ca lokataḥ śīlayet puruṣa^prakṛtitaś ca//
GS39kamasutu:2264: 6.3.2/.tatra svābhāvikaṃ saṃkalpāt samadhikaṃ vā labhamānā na^upāyān prayuñjīta^ity ācāryāḥ/
GS39kamasutu:2265: 6.3.3/.viditam apy upāyaiḥ pariṣkṛtaṃ dviguṇaṃ dāsyati^iti vātsyāyanaḥ//(p.324)
GS39kamasutu:2271: 6.3.9/.tathā yācita^alaṃkārāṇāṃ nāyaka^alaṃkārāṇāṃ ca tad^abhigamana^arthasya vyayasya praṇidhibhir nivedanam/
GS39kamasutu:2281: 6.3.17/.gṛha^karma/ sakhyāḥ putrasya^utsañjanam dohado vyādhir mitrasya duḥkha^apanayanam iti/
GS39kamasutu:2283: 6.3.19/.tayā śīlitasya ca^alaṃkārasya bhāṇḍa^upaskarasya vā vaṇijo vikraya^arthaṃ darśanam/
GS39kamasutu:2284: 6.3.20/.pratigaṇikānāṃ ca sadṛśasya bhāṇḍasya vyatikare prativiśiṣṭasya grahaṇam/
GS39kamasutu:2287: 6.3.23/.tāsu nāyaka^samakṣam ātmano +abhyadhikaṃ lābhaṃ bhūtam abhūtaṃ vā vrīḍitā nāma varṇayet/
GS39kamasutu:2288: 6.3.24/.pūrva^yogināṃ ca lābha^atiśayena punaḥ saṃdhāne yatamānānām aviṣkṛtaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ/
GS39kamasutu:2291: 6.3.27/.viraktaṃ ca nityam eva prakṛti^vikriyāto vidyāt mukha^varṇāc ca//(p.328)
GS39kamasutu:2301: 6.3.36/.tasya sāra^dravyāṇi prāg avabodhād anya^apadeśena haste kurvīta/
GS39kamasutu:2333: narmaṇi ca^anyam apadiśya hasati vadati tasmin kaṭākṣeṇa parijanasya prekṣaṇaṃ tāḍanaṃ ca/
GS39kamasutu:2339: ante svayaṃ mokṣaś ca^iti parigrahakasya^iti dattakasya//
GS39kamasutu:2342: 6.3.45cd/.raktād arthasya ca^ādānam ante mokṣaś ca vaiśikam//(p.332)
GS39kamasutu:2347: 6.4.2/.sa ced avasita^artho vittavān sānu^rāgaś ca tataḥ saṃdheyaḥ//(p.333)
GS39kamasutu:2356: 6.4.10/.itas tataś ca svayam eva^apasṛtya^upajapati ced ubhayor guṇān apekṣī cala^buddhir asaṃdheyaḥ//(p.334)
GS39kamasutu:2358: sa ced anyato bahu^labhamānayā niṣkāsitaḥ syāt sasāro +api tayā roṣito mama^amarṣād bahu dāsyati^iti saṃdheyaḥ//(p.335)
GS39kamasutu:2360: 6.4.13/.itaḥ svayam apasṛtas tato niṣkāsita^apasṛto yady atiriktam ādau ca dadyāt tataḥ pratigrāhyaḥ//(p.335)
GS39kamasutu:2361: 6.4.14/.itaḥ svayam apasṛtya tatra sthita upajapaṃs tarkayitavyaḥ//(p.335)
GS39kamasutu:2362: 6.4.15/.viśeṣa^arthī ca^āgatas tato viśeṣam apaśyann āgantukāmo [mayi] māṃ jijñāsitukāmaḥ sa āgatya sa^anurāgatvād dāsyati/
GS39kamasutu:2363: tasyāṃ vā doṣān dṛṣṭvā mayi bhūyiṣṭhān guṇān adhunā paśyati sa guṇa^darśī bhūyiṣṭhaṃ dāsyati//(p.335)
GS39kamasutu:2364: 6.4.16/.bālo vā na^ekatra^dṛṣṭir atisaṃdhāna^pradhāno vā haridrā^rāgo vā yat kiṃcana^kārī vā ity avetya saṃdadhyān na vā//(p.336)
GS39kamasutu:2365: 6.4.17/.ito niṣkāsita^apasṛtas tataḥ svayam apasṛta upajapaṃs tarkayitavyaḥ/
GS39kamasutu:2367: mama gunair bhāvito yo +anyasyāṃ na ramate//(p.336)
GS39kamasutu:2368_0: 6.4.19 /.pūrvam ayogena vā mayā niṣkāsitaḥ sa māṃ śīlayitvā vairaṃ niryātayitukāmo
GS39kamasutu:2368_1: dhanam abhiyogād vā mayā^asya^apahṛtaṃ tad^viśvāsya pratīpam ādātukāmo nirveṣṭukāmo
GS39kamasutu:2368_2: vā māṃ vartamāna^udbhedayitvā tyaktukāma ity akalyāṇa^buddhir asaṃdheyaḥ //(p.336)
GS39kamasutu:2370: 6.4.21/.ito niṣkāsitas tatra sthita upajapann etena vyākhyātaḥ//(p.337)
GS39kamasutu:2372: 6.4.23/.vyalīka^arthaṃ niṣkāsito mayāsāvan yatra gato yatnād ānetavyaḥ/
GS39kamasutu:2382: 6.4.27/.anena vā pratibaddham anena saṃdhiṃ kṛtvā nāyakaṃ dhaninam avāpsyāmi/
GS39kamasutu:2383: 6.4.28/.vimānito vā bhāryayā tam eva tasyāṃ vikramayiṣyāmi/
GS39kamasutu:2384: 6.4.29/.asya vā mitraṃ mad^dveṣiṇīṃ sapatnīṃ kāmayate tad amunā bhedayiṣyāmi/
GS39kamasutu:2386: 6.4.31/.tasya pīṭhamarda^ādayo mātur dauḥśīlyena nāyikāyāḥ saty apy anurāge (p.338)
GS39kamasutu:2392: sa hi vidita^śīlo dṛṣṭa^rāgaś ca sūpacāro bhavati^ity ācāryāḥ/
GS39kamasutu:2393: 6.4.36/.pūrva^saṃsṛṣṭaḥ sarvato niṣpīḍita^arthatvān na^atyartham arthado duḥkhaṃ ca punar^viśvāsayitum/
GS39kamasutu:2397: 6.4.38ab/.anyāṃ bhedayituṃ gamyād anyato gamyam eva vā/(p.340)
GS39kamasutu:2400: 6.4.39cd/.atisaktaḥ pumān yatra bhayād bahu dadāti ca//(p.340)
GS39kamasutu:2405: 6.4.42ab/.saktaṃ tu vaśinaṃ nārī saṃbhāṣya^apy anyato vrajet/(p.340)
GS39kamasutu:2410: 6.5.1/.gamya^bāhulye bahu pratidinaṃ ca labhamānā na^ekaṃ pratigṛhṇīyāt//(p.342)
GS39kamasutu:2411: 6.5.2/.deśaṃ kālaṃ sthitim ātmano guṇān saubhāgyaṃ ca^anyābhyo nyūna^atiriktatāṃ ca^avekṣya rajanyām arthaṃ sthāpayet//(p.342)
GS39kamasutu:2414: 6.5.4/.dvis triś catur iti lābhā^atiśaya^graha^artham ekasya^api gacchet/
GS39kamasutu:2416: 6.5.5/.gamya^yaugapadye tu lābha^sāmye yad dravya^arthinī syāt tad dāyini viśeṣaḥ pratyakṣa ity ācāryāḥ//(p.343)
GS39kamasutu:2419: 6.5.8/.yat tatra sāmyād vā dravya^sāmye mitra^vākyād atipātitvād āyatito gamya^guṇataḥ prītitaś ca viśeṣaḥ//(p.343)
GS39kamasutu:2422: 6.5.11/.lubdho +api hi raktas tyajati na tu tyāgī nirbandhād rajyata iti vātsyāyanaḥ//(p.344)
GS39kamasutu:2424: tyāgi^prayojana^kartroḥ prayojana^kartari viśeṣaḥ pratyakṣa ity ācāryāḥ//(p.344)
GS39kamasutu:2425: 6.5.13/.prayojana^kartā sakṛt kṛtvā kṛtinam ātmānaṃ manyate tyāgī punar atītaṃ na^apekṣata iti vātsyāyanaḥ//(p.344)
GS39kamasutu:2428: 6.5.16/.ciram ārādhito +api tyāgī vyalīkam ekam upalabhya pratigaṇikayā vā mithyā^dūṣitaḥ śramam atītaṃ na^apekṣate/
GS39kamasutu:2429: 6.5.17/.prāyeṇa hi tejasvina ṛjavo +anādṛtāś ca tyāgino bhavanti/
GS39kamasutu:2431: parīkṣita^śīlatvāc ca na mithyā dūṣyata iti vātsyāyanaḥ//(p.345)
GS39kamasutu:2435: mitraṃ tu sakṛd vākye pratihate kaluṣitaṃ syād iti vātsyāyanaḥ//(p.345)
GS39kamasutu:2437: 6.5.23/.tatra kārya^saṃdarśanena mitram anunīya śvobhūte vacanam astv iti tato +atipātinam arthaṃ pratigṛhṇīyāt//(p.346)
GS39kamasutu:2440: anarthaḥ punaḥ sakṛt^prasṛto na jñāyate kva^avatiṣṭhata iti vātsyāyanaḥ//(p.346)
GS39kamasutu:2447: tad^vyaya^sahiṣṇor vā dhanasya parigrahaṇam ity uttama^gaṇikānāṃ lābha^atiśayaḥ//(p.347)
GS39kamasutu:2449: mahārhair bhāṇḍaiḥ paricārakaiś ca gṛha^paricchadasya^ujjvalata^iti rūpa^ājīvānāṃ lābhā^atiśayaḥ//(p.347)
GS39kamasutu:2450: 6.5.30/.nityaṃ śuklam ācchādanam apakṣudham anna^pānaṃ nityaṃ saugandhikena tāmbūlena ca yogaḥ sahiraṇya^bhāgam alaṃkaraṇam iti kumbha^dāsīnāṃ lābha^atiśayaḥ//(p.348)
GS39kamasutu:2451: 6.5.31/.etena pradeśena madhyama^adhamānām api lābha^atiśayān sarvāsām eva yojayed ity ācāryāḥ//(p.348)
GS39kamasutu:2453_0: 6.5.33 /.gamyam anyato nivārayitukāmā saktam anyasyām apahartukāmā vā anyāṃ vā lābhato
GS39kamasutu:2453_1: viyuyukṣamāṇa^agamya^saṃsargād ātmanaḥ sthānaṃ vṛddhim āyatim abhigamyatāṃ ca manyamānā
GS39kamasutu:2453_2: anartha^pratīkāre vā sāhāyam enaṃ kārayitukāmā saktasya vā ^anyasya vyalīka^arthinī
GS39kamasutu:2453_3: pūrva^upakāram akṛtam iva paśyantī kevala prīty^arthinī vā kalyāṇa^buddher alpam api lābhaṃ
